[\[21b.4\]]yod pa/_'di ltar mkhas shing mdzangs pas rig [#]par bya ba 'di len par 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa/_'di ltar brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/_'di ltar rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/_'di ltar phra ba/_'di ltar zhib pa/_'di ltar blta dka'
[\[21b.5\]]ba/_'di ltar rjes su rtogs par dka' ba/_'di ltar gya nom pa/_'di ltar shin tu 'phags pa la nus pa yod pa/_'di ltar mkhas shing mdzangs pas rig [#]par bya ba 'di len par gyur pa de dag ni nges pa kho nar gzugs stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog [#]par mi 'gyur/_stong pa nyid
[\[21b.6\]]gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_stong pa nyid rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs mtshan ma med ces
[\[21b.7\]]bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_mtshan ma med pa gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_mtshan ma med pa rnam par shes pa zhes
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_smon pa med pa gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa smon pa
[\[22a.2\]]med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_smon pa med pa rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_skye ba med pa gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes
[\[22a.3\]]dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro[#]/_/skye ba med pa rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_'gag pa med pa
[\[22a.4\]]gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_'gag pa med pa rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[22a.5\]]gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_zhi ba gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_zhi ba rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar rnam par
[\[22a.6\]]rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_dben pa gzugs zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_dben pa
[\[22a.7\]]rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du skye zhes bya ba dang /_'gag ces bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du so so ba dang /_bsdus pa'i khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi
[\[22b.2\]]rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_bden pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs
[\[22b.3\]]pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
[\[22b.4\]]'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad
[\[22b.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_mtshan ma med pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_smon pa med pa rnam pa thams cad
[\[22b.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_skye ba med pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro[#]/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'gag pa med ces
[\[22b.7\]]bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_'gag pa med pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_zhi ba rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_dben pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dus byas kyi khams stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_stong pa nyid 'dus byas kyi
[\[23a.2\]]khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dus byas kyi khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par [#]rtog par mi 'gyur/_mtshan ma med pa 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro[#]/_/'dus byas kyi khams smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi
[\[23a.3\]]'gyur/_smon pa med pa 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dus byas kyi khams skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_skye ba med pa 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dus byas kyi khams 'gag
[\[23a.4\]]pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_'gag pa med pa 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dus byas kyi khams zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_zhi ba 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[23a.5\]]'dus byas kyi khams dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_dben pa 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dus ma byas kyi khams stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par
[\[23a.6\]]rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dus ma byas kyi khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_mtshan ma med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dus ma byas kyi khams smon pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_smon
[\[23a.7\]]pa med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dus ma byas kyi khams skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_skye ba med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dus ma byas kyi khams 'gag pa med
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_'gag pa med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar [#]rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dus ma byas kyi khams zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_zhi ba 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[23b.2\]]'dus ma byas kyi khams dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/_dben pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
[\[23b.3\]]pa nas/_de ltar shin tu 'phags pa la nus pa yod pa dang /_de ltar mkhas shing mdzangs pas rig par bya ba'i bar 'di len par byed pa su yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar 'di las chos 'ga' yang ma brjod/_ma bstan/_yongs su snang bar ma byas pa ste/_
[\[23b.4\]]'dir chos 'ga' yang ma bshad/_ma bstan/_yongs su snang bar ma byas pa de kho na ltar 'di len par byed pa'i sems can su yang mi 'byung ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes
[\[23b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po [#]nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyang rgya cher bstan pa ma yin nam/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems [#]yongs su gzung [#]
[\[23b.6\]]ba'i phyir yang bstan pa ma yin nam/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[23b.7\]]dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]lag brgyad pa dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang
[\[24a.2\]]dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su gzung [#]ba'i phyir yang bstan pa ma yin nam/_de
[\[24a.3\]]bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam/_de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba ma yin nam/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas
[\[24a.4\]]kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar [#]'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba ma yin nam/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan
[\[24a.5\]]'das de dag la chos gang thos par gyur pa de dag skye ba gzhan du yang rgyun 'chad [#]par mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'khrug pa med pa dang /_mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ba [#]ma yin
[\[24a.6\]]nam/_thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba [#]ma yin nam/_rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /_mnyam par gzhag [#]pa'i spobs pa dang /_rig [#]pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /_don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon
[\[24a.7\]]par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba [#]ma yin nam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyang rgya cher bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gzung ba yang bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad
[\[24b.2\]]zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i bar du yang 'gyur te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so/_/gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis she na/_bdag dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed
[\[24b.3\]]bu dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_de bzhin du
[\[24b.4\]]rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te [#]reg pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus
[\[24b.5\]]dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_de bzhin du gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya [#]dang /_chos rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_sa'i khams mi
[\[24b.6\]]dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol
[\[24b.7\]]tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan
[\[25a.2\]]lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs
[\[25a.3\]]pa'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_rnam pa
[\[25a.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan/_
[\[25a.5\]]ci'i phyir na [#]mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung [#]ba bstan/_ci'i phyir na mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i bar du 'gyur ba yin/_rab 'byor
[\[25a.6\]]gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum
[\[25a.7\]]rgya cher bstan to/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung [#]ba bstan to/_/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha ji snyed yod pa dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha de rnams
[\[25b.2\]]'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos kyi char 'di ltar phab cing bstan na/_de la bdag cag gis kyang me tog dag mngon par sprul te/_me tog rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_
[\[25b.3\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang /_gnas brtan rab 'byor dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par gtor bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi [#]khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha nas brtsams te/_
[\[25b.4\]]'og min gyi bar gyi lha de dag gis kyang [#]lha rdzas kyi me tog man da ra ba mang po mngon par sprul te/_me tog de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang /_gnas brtan rab 'byor dang /_shes
[\[25b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par gtor bar gyur to/_/mngon par rab tu gtor bar gyur to/_/kun tu rab tu 'thor bar gyur to/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nas/_'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi me tog de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
[\[25b.6\]]'di'i gzhi me tog gi [#]khengs par gyur nas steng gi bar snang la yang me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa mdangs dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba kun nas gnas par gyur to/_/de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_'di ltar lha rnams kyis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog
[\[25b.7\]]'di dag ni bdag gis sngon chad lha'i gnas thams cad na yang yod par ma mthong ste/_me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa'o/_/'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni shing dang /_ldum bu dang /_'khri shing las byung ba ma yin gyi/_'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba ste me tog [#]'di dag ni shing dang /_ldum bu dang /_'khri shing las byung ba ma yin no snyam mo/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa
[\[26a.2\]]rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni ma byung [#]ste me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba ma yin no/_/shing dang /_ldum bu dang /_'khri shing las byung ba ma yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka 'di skad du me tog 'di dag ni ma skyes pa ste/_me tog [#]'di dag ni yid las byung ba ma
[\[26a.3\]]yin[#]/_shing dang /_ldum bu dang /_'khri shing las byung ba ma yin no zhes zer na/_kau shi ka gang ma skyes pa de ni me tog kyang ma yin no/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag kho na ma byung ba yin nam/_'on te gzugs kyang ma
[\[26a.4\]]byung /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang ma byung ba yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka me tog 'di dag kho na ma byung ba ma yin gyi[#]/_kau shi ka gzugs kyang ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs ma yin no/_/kau shi
[\[26a.5\]]ka tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka mig ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni mig ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_
[\[26a.6\]]yid ni ma byung ba ste gang ma byung ba de ni yid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka sa'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni sa'i khams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams
[\[26a.7\]]ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka nang stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/
[\[26b.2\]]kau shi ka dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du
[\[26b.3\]]yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin
[\[26b.4\]]no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_bden pa dang /_tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_
[\[26b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du
[\[26b.6\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rgyun du zhugs pa ni ma byung ba
[\[26b.7\]]ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rgyun du zhugs pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom ba nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni de
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no zhes bya bas [#]ni mngon par rtogs pa'i [#]rigs bstan pa yin no/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ltar btags pa dang yang mi 'gal la/_chos
[\[27a.2\]]nyid kyang ston pa ni shes rab zab mo dang ldan no/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin te/_gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa ste/_de ltar btags pa dang yang mi 'gal la chos
[\[27a.3\]]nyid kyang ston to/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni btags pa dang yang mi 'gal la chos nyid kyang ston pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka gzugs ni
[\[27a.4\]]btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar [#]bstan to/_/kau shi ka tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni
[\[27a.5\]]chos nyid de/_/de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni mi 'gal rnam par mi 'gal lo/_/gang mi 'gal rnam par mi 'gal ba de ni/_gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba med do/_/
[\[27a.6\]]kau shi ka so so ba dang /_bsdus pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
[\[27a.7\]]dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba [#]rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_/
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_bden
[\[27b.2\]]pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po rnams dang /_de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
[\[27b.3\]]dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom ba nyid dang /_rang byang chub nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar [#]bstan
[\[27b.4\]]to/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_
[\[27b.5\]]de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid de ni mi 'gal ba ste/_gang mi 'gal ba de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba med do/_/kau shi ka de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni btags
[\[27b.6\]]pa dang 'gal bar mi byed la chos nyid kyang ston to/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos thams cad ni btags pa tsam du bstan to/_/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
[\[27b.7\]]kyang de ltar chos thams cad btags pa tsam du rig nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos [#]de ltar slob pa ni gzugs la mi slob/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]shes pa la mi slob [#]po/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni [#]'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_de bzhin du gang la bslab par bya ba'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang dag
[\[28a.2\]]par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas so/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims
[\[28a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de
[\[28a.4\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas so/_/nang stong pa nyid la mi slob/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la yang mi slob [#]ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i nang stong pa nyid de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
[\[28a.5\]]stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la mi slob ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
[\[28a.6\]]bas so/_/de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
[\[28a.7\]]dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_bden pa rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams [#]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi slob po[#]/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la mi slob/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi slob ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas so/_/de nas lha
[\[28b.2\]]rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su
[\[28b.3\]]mi mthong bas so/_/de bzhin du [#]so so ba dang /_bsdus pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'am/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_tshad med pa dang /_
[\[28b.4\]]bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_gang la bslab par bya ba'i bden pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_
[\[28b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis [#]stong ngo /_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed
[\[28b.6\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo /_/de bzhin du phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_
[\[28b.7\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_bden pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka gzugs stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas so/_/
[\[29a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar stong pa nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar stong pa nyid [#]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas so/_/kau shi ka gang stong pa nyid la slob pa de ni gnyis su byar med pas [#]gzugs stong pa nyid la slob po/_/gnyis su byar med pas [#]tshor ba dang
[\[29a.3\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob po/_/gnyis su byar med pas [#]so so ba dang /_bsdus pa'i phung po rnams dang /_khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams
[\[29a.4\]]dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_bden pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad [#]dang /_ting nge 'dzin
[\[29a.5\]]thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po [#]rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar stong pa nyid la
[\[29a.6\]]slob [#]po/_/kau shi ka gang gzugs stong pa nyid la gnyis su byar med pas slob pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar stong pa nyid la gnyis su byar med pas slob pa de ni gnyis su byar med pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob po/_/de ni gnyis su byar med pas tshul
[\[29a.7\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob po/_/de ni gnyis su byar med pas nang stong pa nyid la slob po/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob po/_/de ni gnyis su byar med pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam
[\[29b.2\]]yan lag brgyad pa rnams la slob po/_/de ni gnyis su byar med pas tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po [#]dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig
[\[29b.3\]]pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob po/_/gnyis su byar med pas ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs [#]kyi sgo thams cad la slob po/_/gnyis su byar med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med gzhal du med pa la slob po/_/gnyis su byar med
[\[29b.4\]]pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu [#]dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub nyid la slob po/_/gnyis su byar med pas sangs rgyas nyid dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
[\[29b.5\]]pa nyid la slob po zhes bya ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi lam nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa las drod du gtogs pa yin no/_/[#]gzugs 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob/_'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa 'phel
[\[29b.6\]]bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob/_'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po/_/de bzhin du so so ba dang /_bsdus pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob/_'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i
[\[29b.7\]]phyir mi slob po/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]tu phyin pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams
[\[30a.2\]]dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po/_/tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir
[\[30a.3\]]mi slob po/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po/_/bden pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
[\[30a.4\]]dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [#]rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po/_/gang gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi
[\[30a.5\]]slob pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa de ni gzugs yongs su gzung [#]bar bya ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung bar bya ba
[\[30a.6\]]dang /_med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/_/de bzhin du so so ba dang /_bsdus pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang /_med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po/_/de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
[\[30a.7\]]chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_tshad med pa rnams [#]dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_bden pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]gzung bar bya ba dang /_med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su gzung bar bya ba
[\[30b.2\]]dang /_med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po zhes bya ba ni/_de nyid kyi rtse mor gtogs pa yin no//_//bam po nyi shu dgu pa/_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang /_med par
[\[30b.3\]]bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung [#]bar bya ba dang /_med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang /_med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin/_
[\[30b.4\]]rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs yongs su gzung du med de[#]/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs kyis gzugs yongs su gzung du med pas so[#]/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[30b.5\]]'du byed rnams dang /_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung du med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas yongs su gzung du med pas so/_/de bzhin du so so ba dang /_bsdus pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing
[\[30b.6\]]'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang /_bden pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[30b.7\]]so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su gzung du med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos ma 'dres pa chos ma 'dres pas yongs su gzung du med pas so/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gzung [#]du med de/_
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su gzung du med pas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba
[\[31a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo /_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[31a.3\]]phyin pa la slob bam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par
[\[31a.4\]]'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi bzod par gtogs pa'o/_/[#]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad yongs su gzung [#]bar bya ba dang /_med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob na rnam pa thams
[\[31a.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs kyi skye ba mi mthong /_'gag pa dang /_blang ba dang /_dor ba
[\[31a.6\]]dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_stsogs pa dang /_'bri ba dang /_'grib pa dang /_'phel ba mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis med pas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub
[\[31a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi mthong ngo [#]/_/'gag pa dang /_blang ba dang /_dor ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_stsogs pa dang /_'bri ba dang /_'grib pa dang /_
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]'phel ba mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis med pas so/_/de bzhin du so so ba dang /_bsdus pa'i phung po rnams dang /_khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_
[\[31b.2\]]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_bden pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa
[\[31b.3\]]rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba mi mthong /_'gag
[\[31b.4\]]pa dang /_blang ba dang /_dor ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_stsogs pa dang /_'bri ba dang /_'grib pa dang /_'phel ba mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin
[\[31b.5\]]gyis med cing mi dmigs pas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_stsogs
[\[31b.6\]]pa med pa dang /_'bri ba med pa dang /_'grib pa med pa dang /_'phel ba med pa'i phyir slob na/_mi slob pa dang /_nges par mi 'byung ba'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi chos kyi mchog tu gtogs
[\[31b.7\]]pa yin no/_/[#]'di dag gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gsungs pa yin no/_/[#]de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang las btsal bar bya/_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa ni rab 'byor gyi le'u las btsal bar bya'o/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa rab 'byor 'phags pa shA ri'i bu 'di skad du kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rab 'byor gyi le'u las
[\[32a.2\]]btsal bar bya'o zhes zer ba de khyod kyi mthu yin nam/_khyod kyi byin gyi [#]rlabs yin nam[#]/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka 'di ni bdag gi mthu ma yin/_'di ni bdag gi byin gyi rlabs [#]ma yin no/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'o na de su'i mthu su'i byin gyi [#]rlabs/_rab
[\[32a.3\]]'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs [#]so/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po byin gyi rlabs [#]med pa'i chos nyid las gzhan na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs de bzhin nyid las gzhan na yang [#]de
[\[32a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs te/_chos thams cad byin gyi rlabs [#]med pa'o/_/lha rnams kyi dbang pos smras pa/_'phags pa rab 'byor chos thams cad byin gyi rlabs [#]med pa yin na/_ci'i phyir de skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
[\[32a.5\]]byin gyi [#]rlabs so zhes smra[#]/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byin gyi [#]rlabs med pa'i chos nyid las gzhan na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs la/_de bzhin nyid las gzhan na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/byin gyi [#]rlabs med
[\[32a.6\]]pa'i chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs la/_de bzhin gshegs pa la yang byin gyi [#]rlabs med pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so/_/[#]gzugs kyi
[\[32a.7\]]de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so/_/gzugs kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang gzugs kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so/_/
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang /_'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so/_/rnam par shes
[\[32b.2\]]pa'i chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du phung po rnams dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_
[\[32b.3\]]mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin
[\[32b.4\]]thams cad dang /_gzungs [#]kyi sgo thams cad dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/de
[\[32b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa la yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so/_/
[\[32b.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ldan pa yang ma [#]yin/_bral ba yang ma yin pas so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba
[\[32b.7\]]yang ma yin pas so/_/kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa dang gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin pas so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin pas
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]so/_/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin pas so/_/gzugs kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin pas so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams
[\[33a.2\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa [#]gzhan dang ldan pa yang [#]ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin pas so/_/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin pas so/_/rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_rnam pa thams
[\[33a.3\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bar du ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin pas so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin pas so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang
[\[33a.4\]]ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin pas so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin pas so/_/kau shi ka 'dir chos thams cad dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_bral ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni de'i mthu ste/_
[\[33a.5\]]de'i byin gyi rlabs [#]kyi tshul gyis so/_/kau shi ka gang yang 'di skad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang nas btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni gzugs las btsal bar mi bya/_gzugs las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o/_/tshor ba dang /_
[\[33a.6\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa las btsal bar mi bya/_rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni [#]'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_gzugs gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba gang yin pa
[\[33a.7\]]dang /_'du shes gang yin pa dang /_'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin/_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_
[\[33b.2\]]tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_bden pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa
[\[33b.3\]]rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las kyang btsal bar mi bya/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan du yang [#]btsal bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe [#]na/_kau shi ka de
[\[33b.4\]]ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa mtshan nyid gcig
[\[33b.5\]]pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_gzugs las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_tshor ba ma yin/_'du shes ma yin/_'du byed rnams ma yin/_rnam par shes pa
[\[33b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du so so ba dang /_bsdus pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi
[\[33b.7\]]phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_bden pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
[\[34a.2\]]las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_de bzhin du gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin/_'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin/_'du
[\[34a.3\]]byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi chos
[\[34a.4\]]nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_tshor ba'i chos nyid ma yin/_'du shes kyi chos nyid ma yin/_'du byed rnams kyi chos nyid ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gzhan shes
[\[34a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos
[\[34a.6\]]nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad ni med cing mi dmigs pas te[#]/_de ltar chos thams
[\[34a.7\]]cad med cing mi dmigs pas na gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_gzugs las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]yin/_gzugs kyi chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi chos nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_tshor ba ma yin/_'du shes ma yin/_'du byed rnams ma yin/_rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_rnam par
[\[34b.2\]]shes pa las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
[\[34b.3\]]yin/_rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_de bzhin du so so ba dang /_bsdus pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
[\[34b.4\]]rtsa bdun dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_bden pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_
[\[34b.5\]]stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[34b.6\]]pa ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_
[\[34b.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam la phan yon dang bcas pa'i dbang du byas nas sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/[#]btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
[\[35a.2\]]phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang la bslabs shing rgyun du zhugs pa rnams
[\[35a.3\]]kyis [#]ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob po/_/de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang rang byang chub rab tu 'thob po/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes
[\[35a.4\]]su thob nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub
[\[35a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/byang chub sems
[\[35a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang la bslabs shing rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis ni [#]rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob po/_/de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_
[\[35a.7\]]dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis [#]ni rang byang chub 'thob po/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis [#]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs chen po nyid yin pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu [#]phyin pa 'di ni [#]chen po nyid de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
[\[35b.2\]]gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa chen po nyid yin pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
[\[35b.3\]]phyin pa 'di ni chen po nyid de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du so so ba dang /_bsdus pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing
[\[35b.4\]]'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_bden pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_
[\[35b.5\]]stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu [#]dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams
[\[35b.6\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chen po yin pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po nyid de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_
[\[35b.7\]]dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chen po nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa yin no/_/kau shi ka gzugs la tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs tshad med pa ni dmigs su med pas so/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med de/_kau shi ka de bzhin du gzugs kyi tshad kyang
[\[36a.2\]]dmigs su med de/_nam mkha' la tshad med pa'i phyir gzugs la tshad med de[#]/_gzugs la tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi [#]pha rol tu phyin pa la tshad med pa'o/_/kau shi ka tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[36a.3\]]rnam par shes pa la tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs
[\[36a.4\]]su med do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med de/_nam mkha' la tshad med pa'i phyir/_rnam par shes pa la tshad med do/_/rnam par shes pa la tshad med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[36a.5\]]ni tshad med pas so/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_bden pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_
[\[36a.6\]]tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos
[\[36a.7\]]ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med pas so/_/
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/_nam mkha' la tshad med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la tshad med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la tshad med
[\[36b.2\]]pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'o/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa bzod pa [#]
[\[36b.3\]]yin no/_/kau shi ka gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad ni dmigs su med pas so/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha'i
[\[36b.4\]]tshad ni dmigs su med do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du gzugs kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do/_/nam mkha' la tshad med pa'i phyir gzugs la tshad med do/_/gzugs la tshad med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad med do/_/
[\[36b.5\]]de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa yin no/_/[#]kau shi ka gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir
[\[36b.6\]]zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs [#]so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'o/_/
[\[36b.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka [#]de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du so so ba dang /_bsdus pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_dran ba nye bar gzhag pa rnams
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_bden pa rnams dang /_
[\[37a.2\]]stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /[# ]ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo [#]dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
[\[37a.3\]]mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des na byang chub sems
[\[37a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar mtha' yas pa'i phyir mtha' yas pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rgyu dgag pa yin no/_/[#]kau shi ka gzhan yang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir
[\[37a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/lha rnams kyi dbang pos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[37a.6\]]dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
[\[37a.7\]]tu phyin pa [#]mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung ba dgag pa yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang chos dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni [#]mtha' yas pa ste/_'di
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab
[\[37b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba ni rab tu skye ba dgag pa yin
[\[37b.3\]]no/_/[#]kau shi ka gzhan yang de bzhin nyid dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/lha rnams kyi dbang pos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ci'i
[\[37b.4\]]phyir na de bzhin nyid dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir
[\[37b.5\]]dmigs pa mtha' yas so/_/de ltar de bzhin nyid dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba ni rkyen dgag pa yin no/_/[#]kau shi ka gzhan
[\[37b.6\]]yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/lha rnams kyi dbang pos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang
[\[37b.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [#]zhes bya/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_'di lta ste/_sems can sems can zhes bya ba de chos gang gi tshig bla dgas [#]yin/_
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]lha rnams kyi dbang pos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni chos kyi tshig bla dgas [#]ma yin gyi/_'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa'o/_/'di ni dngos po med pa'i ming du btags pa'o/_/'di ni dmigs pa med
[\[38a.2\]]pa'i ming du btags pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las [#]sems can du bshad pa gang yang yod dam/_lha rnams kyi dbang pos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka
[\[38a.3\]]gal te sems can du bshad pa med na de la sems can mtha' yas pa ci yang med pa'o/_/kau shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs te/_sems can sems can zhes tshig tu brjod na/_
[\[38a.4\]]kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_de la sems can gang yang skye ba'am/_'gag par 'gyur ba yod dam/_lha rnams kyi dbang pos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau
[\[38a.5\]]shi ka rnam grangs des na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi sems can gyi khams kyi ched du 'jug pa gsal bar bstan pa yin te/_'di dag gis ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa bstan pa yin no/_/
[\[38a.6\]]de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med du bcas pa dag gis lan gsum du ched du [#]brjod pa ched du brjod pa ni 'di lta ste/_e ma'o chos/_e ma'o chos/_
[\[38a.7\]]chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis [#]gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te bshad cing brjod la rab tu gsal bar byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral bar gyur pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o/_/gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams sam/_rnam par shes pa'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos zhes bya ba
[\[38b.2\]]gang yang dmigs su ma mchis kyang theg pa gsum gyi rnam par gzhag pa mchis te/_gang zhe na/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa chen po'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de rnams la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag de de
[\[38b.3\]]bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed rnams sam/_rnam par shes pa'am/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos zhes bya ba gang yang dmigs su med kyang theg pa gsum rnam par gzhag pa yod
[\[38b.4\]]de/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa chen po'o/_/lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral bar gyur pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung
[\[38b.5\]]bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan te/[# ]nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa chen po'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi
[\[38b.6\]]dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid
[\[38b.7\]]las gzhan dang /_phyi stong pa nyid las gzhan dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid las gzhan dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las gzhan na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gzhan na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams las gzhan dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_bden pa dang /_tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med
[\[39a.2\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gzhan na [#]yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gzhan na yang
[\[39a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so/_/lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad la slob pa ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang por byas nas rnam pa
[\[39a.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob po/_/lha'i bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral [#]bar spyod pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du brjod par bya'o/_/lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe nga rgyal po'i pho brang gi nang mar
[\[39a.5\]]me can zhes bya ba'i tshong 'dus kyi dbus na [#]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi drung na 'dug pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur/_de bzhin du [#]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[39a.6\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur/_de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi [#]bar dang bral bar ma gyur/_
[\[39a.7\]]de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur/_de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_lam rnams dang bral bar ma gyur/_de bzhin du tshad med pa
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas
[\[39b.2\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi [#]tshad med pa gzhan dag dang yang bral bar ma gyur te/_de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so/_/lha'i bu dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal
[\[39b.3\]]pa grangs med pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi
[\[39b.4\]]ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes nga lung bstan to zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa yin no/_/de nas lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[39b.5\]]chen po rnams kyi [#]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin du so so ba dang /_bsdus pa'i phung po rnams dang /_khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_dran pa nye bar
[\[39b.6\]]gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
[\[39b.7\]]rnams dang /_bden pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mthun par 'dzin pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor bzhi
[\[40a.2\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams 'dus shing tshogs pa rnams dbang du btsugs te/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka byang
[\[40a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen [#]nam/_dge bsnyen [#]ma'am/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_lha'i bu'am/_lha'i bu mo gang [#]la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_'chang
[\[40a.4\]]bar 'gyur ba dang /_klog par 'gyur ba dang /_kun chub par byed par 'gyur ba dang /_sgom par 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan rnams la rgya cher [#]yang dag par rab tu gsal bar byed par 'gyur ba dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ba dang /_gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
[\[40a.5\]]pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar byed pa de dag ni bdud dam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo [#]de dag gis [#]gzugs stong pa nyid la legs par gnas par 'gyur bas so/_/de
[\[40a.6\]]bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la legs par gnas par 'gyur bas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/_mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/_
[\[40a.7\]]smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed pas so/_/de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba stong pa nyid la legs par gnas par 'gyur/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_bden pa
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid la legs par gnas par 'gyur/_de bzhin du stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs
[\[40b.2\]]kyi sgo thams cad dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams stong pa nyid la legs par gnas par 'gyur/_de bzhin du stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs
[\[40b.3\]]pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad [#]la legs par gnas par 'gyur/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar stong pa nyid la legs par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid
[\[40b.4\]]la glags mi rnyed/_mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/_smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed pas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang gis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_gang du glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_gang la glags rnyed par
[\[40b.5\]]'gyur ba de dag gi ngo bo nyid med pas so zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag la mi'am/_mi ma yin pa dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am
[\[40b.6\]]rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi don du byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms shin tu bsgom pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nyam nga ba ma spongs [#]par dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i
[\[40b.7\]]phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gis sems can thams cad la yang dag pa'i rim gros bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]lha'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'am/_'thab bral ba'am/_dga' ldan pa'am/_'phrul dga' ba'am/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'am/_tshangs ris pa'am/_tshangs pa mdun na 'don pa'am/_tshangs 'khor ba'am/_'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bla
[\[41a.2\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa dang /_lha'i bu gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma thos pa[#]/_ma bzung [#]ba dang /_ma bcangs pa dang /_ma klags pa dang /_kun chub par ma byas pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa de dag
[\[41a.3\]]gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya'o/_/gzung bar bya'o/_/bcang bar bya'o/_/klag [#]par bya'o/_/kun chub par bya'o/_/tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma bral bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su
[\[41a.4\]]shes pa yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma bral bar byed pa'i
[\[41a.5\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni kau shi ka khyim stong pa na 'dug kyang rung /_bla gab med pa na 'dug kyang rung /_lam gol ba na 'dug kyang rung ste/_'jigs pa'am rengs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis nang
[\[41a.6\]]stong pa nyid mi [#]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/_/phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs
[\[41a.7\]]pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_gnas
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]gtsang ma'i bar gyi lha'i bu ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos shing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun
