[\[82a.2\]]kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten brtsigs te/_de dag la me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis rim gror byas/_bla mar byas[#]/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas
[\[82a.3\]]pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don la mos pa chung ngu'i chung ngu yin no/_/[#]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka yongs su brtag [#]pa bzung na khyod la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs
[\[82a.4\]]pa'i sku gdung gis [#]byur bur gang ba zhig kyang gtad la/_gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang gtad na/_cha gzhag pa de gnyis las gang len/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
[\[82a.5\]]gis byur bur gang ba zhig kyang la las stsal la[#]/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas glegs bam du byas pa zhig kyang la las stsal na/_cha gzhag pa de gnyis las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
[\[82a.6\]]gdung de dag la bdag mi gus pa yang ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag la ston [#]par mi 'tshal ba dang /_rim gror bgyid par [#]mi 'tshal ba dang /_bla mar bgyid bar [#]mi 'tshal ba dang /_bsti stang du bgyid par mi 'tshal ba dang /_mchod par bgyid par yang mi
[\[82a.7\]]'tshal ba yang ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang [#]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las byung bas rim gror bgyid pa [#]lags/_bla mar bgyid pa lags/_bsti stang du bgyid pa lags/_mchod par bgyid pa lags te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]bsgrub pa [#]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag gis mchod pa brnyes so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung [#]du med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_
[\[82b.2\]]'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa yin na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung du med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa de la ji ltar gzung bar bya bar sems/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_dor
[\[82b.3\]]bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin/_'grib pa'i phyir ma yin/_'phel ba'i phyir ma yin/_bskyed pa'i phyir ma yin/_bskyung ba'i phyir ma yin/_dbri [#]ba'i phyir ma yin/_bsnan pa'i phyir ma yin/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir ma yin/_rnam par byang ba'i phyir ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi
[\[82b.4\]]chos rnams ster bar byed pa ma yin/_so so'i [#]skye bo'i chos rnams ster bar [#]byed pa ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang /_slob pa dang /_mi slob pa'i chos rnams ster bar byed pa ma yin/_'dus ma byas kyi
[\[82b.5\]]dbyings ster bar byed pa ma yin/_nang stong pa nyid nas [#]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ster bar byed pa ma yin/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ster bar byed pa ma yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po dang /_
[\[82b.6\]]stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so [#]yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ster bar
[\[82b.7\]]byed pa ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du [#] ster bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu ji skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ster bar byed pa ma yin/_
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ster bar byed pa ma yin no zhes zer ba/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su yod pa ma yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[83a.2\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su yod pa ma yin te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
[\[83a.3\]]la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_kau shi ka legs so legs so/_/de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su yod pa ma yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su med pa'o/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi
[\[83a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su yod pa ma yin te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su med pa'o/_/kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[83a.5\]]phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de [#]gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha
[\[83a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la
[\[83a.7\]]gnyis su 'dod du zad de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin nyid dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su
[\[83b.2\]]'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang /_
[\[83b.3\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab
[\[83b.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa ste/_gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslabs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/
[\[83b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag chos bzangs lha'i 'dun [#]sa na lha rnams kyi dbang po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/_der lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig bdag gi rim gro la mchis pa de dag kun kyang bdag la mchod par bgyid de/_nam bdag [#]seng ge'i khri la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe yang lha'i bu de
[\[83b.6\]]dag gnas der mchis shing lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin chos kyi stan 'di la 'dug cing sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la chos ston to zhes lha'i bu de dag bdag gi stan de [#]la phyag 'tshal te slar mchi'o[#]/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing gzhag pa'am/_
[\[83b.7\]]kha ton du bgyid pa'am/_gzhan la rgya cher ston pa de phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha'i bu ji snyed cig mchis pa dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye [#]chen po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang de bzhin
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di [#]las byung ngo /_/sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bgyis nas slar mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
[\[84a.2\]]sku gdung ji snyed pa de snyed kyis [#]mchod pa brnyes pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsgrubs pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gzhir gyur to/_/rkyen du gyur to/_/bcom ldan
[\[84a.3\]]'das de bas na cha de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs te/_chos nyid kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yid kyis kha ton bgyid cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bgyid pa
[\[84a.4\]]de'i tshe 'jigs pa'am/_bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/_rtags [#]ma mchis/_brjod du ma mchis pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos
[\[84a.5\]]su ma mchis pa'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/_rtags ma mchis/_brjod du ma
[\[84a.6\]]mchis pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni smos su ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [#]mtshan ma dang bcas pa/_rtags dang bcas pa/_brjod pa dang bcas pa/_smos pa dang bcas pa
[\[84a.7\]]zhig lags kyi/_mtshan ma ma mchis/_rtags ma mchis/_brjod du ma mchis/_smos su ma mchis pa ma lags na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos thams cad la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_rtags ma mchis pa dang /_brjod du ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]smos su ma mchis pa thugs su chud de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_rtags ma mchis pa dang /_brjod du ma mchis pa dang /_smos su ma mchis pa'i chos mi ston pa zhig na/_bcom
[\[84b.2\]]ldan 'das gang gi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis/_rtags ma [#]mchis/_brjod du ma mchis/_smos su ma mchis pas de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma mchis pa dang /_rtags ma mchis pa dang /_brjod du ma mchis pa dang /_smos
[\[84b.3\]]su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_rtags ma mchis pa dang /_brjod du ma mchis pa dang /_smos su ma mchis pa'i chos ston to zhes bya ba ni
[\[84b.4\]]gzhan gyi don la mos pa chung ngu'i 'bring yin no/_/[#]bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_
[\[84b.5\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis rim gror bgyid/_bla mar bgyid/_bsti stang du bgyid/_mchod par bgyid pa des nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin
[\[84b.6\]]rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang mi 'bral bar yang 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la me tog dang /_
[\[84b.7\]]spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis [#]rim gror bya ba dang /_bla ma dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod pa bgyid cing 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gzhan
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]gyi don la mos pa chung ngu'i chen po yin no/_/[#]bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gtams pa zhig stsal la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang bris nas glegs bam
[\[85a.2\]]du bgyis te stsal na/_bcom ldan 'das cha gzhag [#]pa de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams lags pa'i slad du ste/_de bas na rim gror bgyi ba dang /_bla mar bgyi ba dang /_bsti
[\[85a.3\]]stang du bgyi ba dang /_mchod par bgyi ba lags so/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de la rim gror bgyis/_bkur stir bgyis/[# ]bsti stang du bgyis/_mchod par bgyis na log par ltung ba dang /_ngan song du mchi [#]bar mi 'gyur te/_lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong nas
[\[85a.4\]]smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_theg pa chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro[#]/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /_gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba de dag la mi
[\[85a.5\]]'dra ba ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don la mos pa 'bring gi chung ngu yin no/_/[#]bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa
[\[85a.6\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyi [#]mdo dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung [#]bstan pa dang /_gtan la phab pa bstan pa'i bar du gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyis chos ston par [#]mdzad pa dang /_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las [#]shes
[\[85a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung zhing /_kun chub par bgyis te/_gzhan la rgya cher ston pa de dag nyid kyang [#]mi 'dra ba ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum lags pa'i phyir ro/_/'di las byung ba ni mdo dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]lung [#]bstan pa dang /_gtan la phab pa'i bar du bstan pa dag lags pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang po cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyi [#]mdo dang /_dbyangs
[\[85b.2\]]kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung [#]bstan pa dang /_gtan la phab pa bstan pa'i bar du chos ston par [#]mdzad pa dang /_de bzhin du lho dang nub dang /_byang dang 'og dang /_steng gi phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung
[\[85b.3\]]gi bye ma snyed mang po cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyi mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_gtan la phab pa bstan pa'i bar gyi chos ston par mdzad pa dang /[# ]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzung ba dang /_gzhan la rgya cher ston pa'i bar de
[\[85b.4\]]gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum lags pa'i slad du'o/_/'di las byung ba ni mdo dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung [#]bstan pa dang /_gtan la phab pa bstan pa'i bar dag lags pa'i slad du'o/_/
[\[85b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs re re'i phyogs bcu'i bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_
[\[85b.6\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis rim gro dang /_bla ma dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod par bgyid [#]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing [#]glegs bam du byas te/_me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs
[\[85b.7\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis rim gro dang /_bla ma dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod ba [#]bgyis pa yang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams lags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]la mos pa 'bring gi 'bring yin no/_/[#]bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di [#]'dzin par 'gyur/_'chang bar 'gyur/_klog par 'gyur/_kun chub par bgyid par 'gyur/_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur zhing
[\[86a.2\]]gzhan la rgya cher ston par 'gyur ba des [#]ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi [#]rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi ste/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo
[\[86a.3\]]de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin par bgyid[#]/_'chang bar bgyid[#]/_klog par bgyid[#]/_kun chub par bgyid[#]/_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing bris pa
[\[86a.4\]]de la yang me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis rim gror bgyid/_bla mar bgyid/_bsti stang du bgyid/_mchod par bgyid pa ste/_de la gang nas kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i dogs pa
[\[86a.5\]]ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu nor gyi bdag po zhig 'jigs nas rgyal po la brten [#]pas de gang la 'jigs par 'gyur ba de dag nyid kyang de nyid la brten pas de dag gis 'jigs par [#]mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mthu dang
[\[86a.6\]]ldan pa la brten nas 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs [#]pas na mchod pa brnyes so/_/bcom ldan 'das de la rgyal po ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bar
[\[86a.7\]]bgyi'o/_/rgyal po la brten pa'i skyes bu ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa brnyes pa de lta [#]bar bgyi'o/_/de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pas mchod pa brnyes so/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrub [#]par blta'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bas na cha de gnyis las 'dam du stsal [#]na bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams lags pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[86b.2\]]'di las byung ba ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis lags pa'i phyir ro/_/'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad lags pa'i phyir ro/_/'di las byung ba ni
[\[86b.3\]]byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po lags pa'i phyir ro/_/'di las byung ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob [#]pa lags pa'i phyir ro/_/'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong
[\[86b.4\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sems can rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/_'chang bar 'gyur/_klog par 'gyur/_kun chub par bgyid par 'gyur/_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ba der sems can de rnams la mi'am mi ma lags pas glags lta zhing [#]
[\[86b.5\]]glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po dang ldan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
[\[86b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de rnams sangs rgyas kyi [#]bya bas nye bar gnas pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dar bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
[\[86b.7\]]der ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra bar blta'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa zhig mchis par gyur la/_nor bu rin po che chen po de la yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ldan te/_gang dang gang du nor bu rin po che chen po de gzhag pa [#]dang der mi ma lags pa
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do/_/skyes pa'am/_bud med gang dang gang [#]mi ma lags pas zin par 'gyur ba [#]de dang de la nor bu rin po che chen po de bstan na/_nor bu rin po che chen po de bstan pa tsam kho nas mi ma lags pa de nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gzi brjid mi bzod pas
[\[87a.2\]]de myur du mchi'o[#]/_/gang gi tshe mkhris pas gdungs pa'i lus la nor bu [#]rin po che chen po de btags na mkhris pa de yang 'byang bar 'gyur la 'phel bar mi 'gyur te nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung gis [#]gdungs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na rlung de yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[87a.3\]]bad kan gyis gdungs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na bad kan de rnams thams cad kyang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/'dus pa'i nad kyis btab pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na 'dus pa'i nad de zhi bar 'gyur gyi rnam par mi 'phel lo/_/nub mo ni nor bu rin po che
[\[87a.4\]]chen po des snang bar bgyid do/_/tsha ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po chen po des phyogs gang du gzhag [#]pa'i sa phyogs de bsil bar bgyid par 'gyur bar bgyid do/_/grang ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de[#]sa phyogs gang du gzhag [#]pa'i sa phyogs de dro bar bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/nor bu rin po che chen
[\[87a.5\]]po de gang du gzhag [#]pa'i sa phyogs de ha cang yang mi dro ha cang yang mi grang zhing dus bde bar 'gyur ro/_/nor bu rin po che chen po de dogs [#]sa'i phyogs gang du gzhag [#]pa'i sa phyogs der sbrul lam/_sdig pa la sogs pa'am gdug pa can rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro//_//bam po sum cu
[\[87a.6\]]gsum pa/_skyes pa'am bud med la la zhig sbrul gdug pas zin par gyur pa la nor bu rin po che chen po bstan na de des mthong ma thag tu yang dug de yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag dang ldan par 'gyur te/_skyes pa'am bud med
[\[87a.7\]]la la zhig nad sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur pa las/_de rnams kyi lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na de dag gi [#]nad de thams cad kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de gang gi tshe chab kyi nang du stsal na de'i tshe chab de thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra bar
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de ras sngon pos dkris te/_chab kyi nang du stsal na chab de yang sngon por bgyid do/_/gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de ras ser po'am/_dmar po'am/_le brgan nam/_shel gyi kha dog gi ras kyis dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na
[\[87b.2\]]chab de yang de'i kha dog tu bgyid do/_/tshon kha dog sna tshogs kyi ras kyis nor bu rin po che chen po de dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal [#]na chab de yang kha dog sna tshogs su bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de chab rnyog pa can gyi nang du stsal na/_chab de thams cad shin tu dang bar bgyid de/_
[\[87b.3\]]nor bu rin po che chen po de yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/[# ]nor bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas zhig yin nam/_'on te nor bu rin po che chen po de [#]
[\[87b.4\]]'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams [#]la yang yod/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo nor bu rin po che chen po de ni lha rdzas so/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la nor bu rin po che chen po gang yod pa de ni chung zhing lci la lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po gang yin pa de dag ni che zhing yang la/_'dzam
[\[87b.5\]]bu'i gling gi mi de rnams kyi nor bu rin po che ni [#]de ltar yon tan gyi rnam pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni ma yin no/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi nor bu rin po che de dag gis ni lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che de'i grangs su yang nye bar mi 'gro/_cha'am/[# ]bgrang ba'am/_dpe'am/_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/nor bu rin
[\[87b.6\]]po che chen po de yang snod la la zhig gi nang du bcug pa las/_gang gi tshe snod de nas nor bu rin po che chen po de phyung bar gyur kyang /_de'i tshe 'dir ni nor bu rin po che chen po de gnas par gyur pa'o zhes snod de la dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang du
[\[87b.7\]]dar bar 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi lus sam/_sems kyi sdug bsngal dang /_gnod pa mi las gyur pa'am/_mi ma lags pa las gyur pa thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur [#]te/_nor bu rin po che chen po zhes bya [#]ba 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ji snyed cig brjod par nus te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan tshad med pa'o/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
[\[88a.2\]]ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
[\[88a.3\]]dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam dang /_tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad
[\[88a.4\]]dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
[\[88a.5\]]pa bco brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ye shes dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes te/_yon tan de rnams kyi snod do/_/
[\[88a.6\]]des na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel gyis mchod pa brnyes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung 'di dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes te/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /_rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa dang /_bsnyel
[\[88a.7\]]ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid kyi snod du [(]gyar [,]gyur [)]pa yin no/_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag gis mchod pa brnyes so zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don la mos pa 'bring gi chen po yin no/_/[#]de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'i snod du gyur pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye mi 'gag pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong ba ma
[\[88b.2\]]mchis 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i snod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyi snod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyis yongs su bsgos pas [#]mchod pa brnyes so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang stong gsum gyi
[\[88b.3\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis [#]byur bur gtams par [#]lta zhog gi_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gtams [#]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[88b.4\]]glegs bam du bris pa zhig 'dam [#]du stsal na/_bcom ldan 'das cha gzhag pa de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku
[\[88b.5\]]gdung rnams kyis mchod pa brnyes pa lags pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la rim gror bgyid pa dang /_bla mar bgyid pa dang /_bsti stang du bgyid pa dang /_mchod par bgyid pa des dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i [#]
[\[88b.6\]]mthar ma bgyis par [#]rgyal rigs sA la chen po'am/_bram ze'i rigs sA la chen po'am/_khyim bdag gi rigs sA la chen po'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /[# ]'phrul dga' rnams [#]
[\[88b.7\]]dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi nang du mi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /_bde ba myong ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi mthar bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung zhing bcangs pa dang bklags
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]shing kun chub par bgyid [#]pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid [#]pas ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas[#]/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis/_brtson 'grus kyi
[\[89a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas[#]/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas[#]/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas[#]/_sbyin pa'i pha
[\[89a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs/_de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las
[\[89a.4\]]'das te/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs shing byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/de ched du bsams shing lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_lus de dag gis kyang sems can yongs su smin par
[\[89a.5\]]bgyid par 'gyur te/_res 'ga' ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i [#]lus yongs su 'dzin/_rgyal rigs sA la chen po'i lus yongs su 'dzin/_bram ze'i rigs sA la chen po'i lus yongs su 'dzin/_khyim bdag gi rigs sA la chen po'i lus yongs su 'dzin cing sems can yongs su smin par
[\[89a.6\]]bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la mi gus pa yang ma lags kyi gus pa lags la/_bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid yongs su gzung bar ma [#]'tshal ba yang ma lags te/_'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rim gro dang /_bla ma
[\[89a.7\]]dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod par bgyid [#]na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la yang rim gror bgyid par 'gyur/_bla ma dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod par bgyid [#]par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad ma mchis/_grangs ma mchis
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang [#]ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong la chos ston pa de dag kyang chos [#]sku dang /_gzugs kyi skur [#]mthong bar 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bgyi/_bcang bar bgyi/_
[\[89b.2\]]bklag par bgyi/_kun chub par bgyi/_mchod par bgyi/_gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi [#]ste/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo des ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang /_tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
[\[89b.3\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gnyis po [#]'di dag ni chos nyid de/_chos nyid
[\[89b.4\]]gnyis gang zhe na/_'dus byas kyi chos nyid dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das de la [#]'dus byas kyi chos nyid gang zhe na/_'di lta ste nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
[\[89b.5\]]nyid kyi bar gyi ye shes dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gang yin pa rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa gang yin pa rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs
[\[89b.6\]]pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi [#]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_
[\[89b.7\]]kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni 'dus byas kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o/_/de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos nyid gang zhe na/_de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /_gnas pa ma mchis pa dang /_mi gnas pa ma mchis pa dang /[# ]kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang /_'phel ba ma mchis pa dang /_'grib pa ma mchis pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
[\[90a.2\]]la brjod par bgyi'o/_/chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid gang lags she na/_gang nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong
[\[90a.3\]]pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[90a.4\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /[# ]gzhan gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa de [#]mi dmigs pa dang /_chos thams cad brjod du med pa dang /_tshig gi spyod yul ma yin pa'i bar gang yin pa 'di dag 'dus ma byas kyi chos
[\[90a.5\]]nyid ces bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don la mos pa chen po'i chung ngu yin no/_/[#]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_'das pa'i dus su byung [#]ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
[\[90a.6\]]rgyas gang [#]ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten [#]te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
[\[90a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba [#]de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten [#]cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na de bzhin
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so[#]/_/'das pa'i dus su [#]
[\[90b.2\]]byung ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus su byung ba dang /[# ]nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
[\[90b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang yang da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
[\[90b.4\]]khams grangs med pa dag na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/_nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /_rang byang chub 'thob po/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
[\[90b.5\]]las theg pa gsum po thams cad kyang [#]rgya cher bstan pa ste/_de dag kyang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang /_skye ba med pa'i tshul dang /_'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul [#]dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul dang /_
[\[90b.6\]]len pa med pa'i tshul dang /_dor ba med pa'i tshul dang /_dbri ba dang /_bsnan pa med pa'i tshul dang /_blang ba dang /_spang ba med pa'i tshul gyis te/_de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di [#]tshu rol lam/_
[\[90b.7\]]pha rol lam/_thang ngam gshong ngam/_mnyam pa'am/_mi mnyam pa'am/_mtshan ma yod pa'am/_mtshan ma med pa'am/_'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa'am/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas sam/_dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa'am[#]/_
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]da ltar byung bar btags pa med pa'i phyir te/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni chos gang yang rab tu [#]ster bar byed pa ma yin te/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams rab tu ster bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don la mos pa
[\[91a.2\]]chen po'i 'bring yin no/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams sems can thams cad kyi
[\[91a.3\]]sems dang spyod pa 'tshal kyang sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/srog dang /_gso bar ma mchis pa dang /_skyes bur ma mchis/_shed bur ma mchis/_shed las skyes su ma mchis/_byed pa por ma mchis/_tshor ba por ma mchis/_shes pa por ma mchis/_mthong ba por
[\[91a.4\]]dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/tshor bar ma mchis so/_/'du shes su ma mchis so/_/'du byed rnams su [#]ma mchis so/_/rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/sa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/chu'i khams su dmigs pa ma
[\[91a.5\]]mchis so/_/me'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/rlung gi khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/nam mkha'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/mig tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/gzugs su dmigs pa ma
[\[91a.6\]]mchis so/_/mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba gang yin pa bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba [#]
[\[91a.7\]]yang ma yin/_bde ba yang ma yin pa de lta bu yang dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi dmigs pa [#]ma mchis so/_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]par shes pa'i bar dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba gang yin pa bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/_
[\[91b.2\]]bde ba yang ma yin pa de lta bur yang dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/
[\[91b.3\]]tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_mngon par shes pa drug tu dmigs pa ma mchis
[\[91b.4\]]so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du dmigs pa ma
[\[91b.5\]]mchis so/_/nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/phyi stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis
[\[91b.6\]]so/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med par dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/sangs rgyas su dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis te/_
[\[91b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas su ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang dmigs pa dang gang gis dmigs par bgyi ba dang /_gang la dmigs par bgyi ba'i ngo bo nyid ma mchis shing mi dmigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]stsal pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_sngon byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dmigs pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pas byang chub kyang mi dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid lta ci smos/_brgya byin gyis
[\[92a.2\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na la spyod kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan rnams la ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mi dmigs pa'i
[\[92a.3\]]tshul gyis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig la ni ma yin te/_des sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/_gtong ba yang mi dmigs/_len pa yang mi dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/_tshul khrims
[\[92a.4\]]dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/_tshul khrims bsrung ba [#]yang mi dmigs so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/_bzod pa dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/_bzod par bya ba yang mi dmigs so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/[ #]bya ba yang mi dmigs/_
[\[92a.5\]]lus dang sems kyang mi dmigs so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/_sems kyang mi dmigs te[#]/_ting nge 'dzin yang mi dmigs so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/_shes rab dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/_shes par bya ba yang mi dmigs so/_/
[\[92a.6\]]kau shi ka 'on kyang [#]chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa gtong ba'i sngon du 'gro zhing 'dren pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims bsrung ba'i sngon
[\[92a.7\]]du 'gro zhing 'dren pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa sgom [#]pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_chos rnams la rnam par [#]lta ba'i sngon du 'gro zhing 'dren pa'o/_/de bzhin du so so ba dang /_
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]bsdus pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs
[\[92b.2\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_de bzhin
[\[92b.3\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /[# ]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_
[\[92b.4\]]chos thams cad kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_'dzam bu'i gling gi shing rnams lo ma dang yal ga sna tshogs can/_me tog dang /_'bras bu sna tshogs can/_dbyibs dang /_chu zheng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang shing de dag gi grib ma la khyad par ram/_
[\[92b.5\]]bye brag tu bya ba mi dmigs te/_'di ni grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar zad do/_/kau shi ka pha rol tu phyin pa lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngos pa rnams la khyad par ram bye brag tu bya ba mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi don
[\[92b.6\]]la mos pa chen po'i chen po yin te[#]/_'di dag gis ni mos pa yid la byed pa gsungs pa yin no/_/[#]brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yon tan thams cad [#]yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das
[\[92b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/_/[#]mi mnyam pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/_/gzhal du ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/_/mtha' yas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/_/bcom ldan
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te 'chang bar 'gyur/_klog par 'gyur/_kun chub par 'gyur zhing de la me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma
[\[93a.2\]]dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis rim gror bgyis/_bla mar bgyis/_bsti stang du bgyis/_mchod par bgyis te/_ji skad du bstan pa [#]bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa dang /_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu
[\[93a.3\]]mo la las [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te gzhan la stsal na de gnyis las gang gi bsod nams ches 'phel bar 'gyur[#]/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas na khyod nyid la 'di dris/_ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig_/kau shi ka
[\[93a.4\]]de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang [#]la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis rim gror byas/_bla mar byas/_
[\[93a.5\]]bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas pa dang /_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung bgo bshar byas te/_yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin pa dang /_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam
[\[93a.6\]]pa de la me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis rim gror byas/_bla mar byas/_bsti stang du byas/[# ]mchod par byas na de dag las gang gi [#]bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin/_brgya byin gyis gsol
[\[93a.7\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo rang nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung 'di la me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang [#]/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]ba dan rnams kyis rim gror bgyis/_bla mar bgyis/_bsti stang du bgyis/_mchod par bgyis/_rjed par bgyis/_bkur stir bgyis pa bas gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi [#]'bru tsam gzhan la stsal na 'di ni de bas bsod nams cher 'phel lo/_/don gyi dbang 'di nyid
[\[93b.2\]]gzigs te rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag [#]nas rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste/_sems can gyi ris na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyis 'dul ba'i sems can mchis pa rnams kyi slad du thugs rje chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis brlabs so/_/de ci'i slad du
[\[93b.3\]]zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gang la las chung ngu na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam rnams la mchod par bgyis na/_de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
[\[93b.4\]]pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/_me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan
[\[93b.5\]]rnams kyis rim gror byas/_bla mar byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas/_rjed [#]par byas pa bas/_bris te gzhan la byin na/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i gzhi las [#]bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bstod pa tsam dang po yin no/_/[#]kau shi ka gzhan yang
[\[93b.6\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji skad du bstan pa 'di gzhan gyi drung du song ste ston/_'grel rnam par 'byed/_gsal bar byed na/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de ni rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de dag pas bsod nams cher
[\[93b.7\]]'phel te[#]/_de ni ston pa yin par bsam mo/_/gzhan dang gzhan gyi yang bla ma'i gnas su 'gyur ro/_/de ni tshangs par spyad pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'dir ston par lta bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir te/_ston pa ni gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]ni gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ston pa/_ston pa nyid kyang [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar
[\[94a.2\]]byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/gang yang mkhas pa tshangs par spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan du phyir mi ldog par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha
[\[94a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di [#]nyid la bslabs shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/kau shi ka nyan thos rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing dgra bcom pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob po/_/rang sangs rgyas kyis rang byang
[\[94a.4\]]chub thob po/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs so/_/'jug go/_/'jug par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dang /_
[\[94a.5\]]spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis mngon du rim gror bya bar 'dod pa dang /_bla mar bya bar 'dod pa dang /_bsti stang du bya bar 'dod pa dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[94a.6\]]'di bris te me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis rim gror bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/bsti stang du bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/ngas don gyi dbang 'di nyid yang dag par mthong ste bla na
[\[94a.7\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di lta ste/_chos gang zhig la bdag rim gro dang /_bla ma dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod pa byas te/_rten [#]cing rnam par spyad par bya snyam na/_kau shi ka de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang du nga dang 'dra ba'am/_lhag par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_de la [#]ngas 'di snyam du bsams [#]te/_de lta yin na bdag gis chos zhi ba bzang po gang bdag nyid kyis
[\[94b.2\]]mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la rim gro dang /_bla ma dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod par bya ste/_rten [#]cing rnam par spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams so/_/kau shi ka chos [#]'di nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/_nga nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rim gror byed/_bla mar
[\[94b.3\]]byed/_bsti stang du byed/_mchod par byed de/_de ltar rim gro dang /_bla ma dang /_bsti stang dang /_mchod par byas shing rnam par spyod na/_kau shi ka ci rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha
[\[94b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa la me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis [#]rim gror mi bya ba dang /_bla mar mi bya ba dang /_bsti stang du [#]mi bya ba dang /_mchod par mi bya ba yin nam/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[94b.5\]]de ni 'di ltar nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams
[\[94b.6\]]kyis rim gror bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba yin pas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so/_/byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
[\[94b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las byung ba ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams so/_/kau shi ka de lta [#]bas na theg pa chen po'am/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis rim gror bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_bsti
[\[95a.2\]]stang du bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/gang la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bstod pa tsam
[\[95a.3\]]gnyis pa yin no/_/kau shi ka sems can gcig cig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel gyi/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la
[\[95a.4\]]bkod pa'i sems can rnams la [#]sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su grol ba ma yin no/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pas ni ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su grol ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bstod pa tsam gsum pa yin no/_/[#]
[\[95a.5\]]de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sems can gcig cig bzhag na de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel gyi/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas [#]ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bstod pa tsam [#]bzhi pa yin no/_/[#]de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sems
[\[95a.6\]]can gcig cig bzhag na de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel gyi/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bstod pa tsam lnga pa yin no/_/[#]de bzhin du sems can gcig cig dgra bcom pa nyid la bzhag na de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel
[\[95a.7\]]gyi/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bstod pa tsam drug pa yin no/_/[#]de bzhin du sems can gcig cig rang byang chub la bzhag na de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel gyi/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi [#]
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]lam la bkod pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bstod pa tsam bdun pa yin no/_/[#]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan la la zhig gis sems can gcig
[\[95b.2\]]cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na des [#]bsod nams ches [#]mang du 'phel lo/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_/de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi gcod pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bstod pa tsam brgyad pa yin no/_/[#]de bzhin du la la zhig gis 'dzam
[\[95b.3\]]bu'i gling gi [#]sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas/_gzhan la la zhig gis [#]sems can gcig cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo zhes bya ba ni bstod pa tsam dgu pa yin no/_/[#]'di dag
[\[95b.4\]]gis ni bstod pa gsungs so/_/de bzhin du la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas/_gzhan la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na de'i bsod nams ches [#]mang du
[\[95b.5\]]'phel lo zhes bya ba ni bkur ba tsam dang po yin no/_/[#]de bzhin du la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa bas/_gzhan la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na de'i bsod nams
[\[95b.6\]]ches mang du 'phel lo zhes bya ba ni bkur ba tsam gnyis pa yin no/_/de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub la bkod pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na
[\[95b.7\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can gcig po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jog pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi gcod [#]pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar rnams yin pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des na 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_'jig rten lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pas byang chub
[\[96a.2\]]sems dpa' rnams mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bkur ba tsam gsum pa yin no/_/[#]kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam nas/_rang sangs rgyas kyi bar la bkod par [#]gyur na/_kau shi ka de ji
[\[96a.3\]]snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang
[\[96a.4\]]gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/_chung ngu na bri ba'am/_bklags [#]pa'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/gang la
[\[96a.5\]]bslabs shing rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag la [#]yang dag par [#]skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go/_/'jug par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob po/_/'thob po/_/'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang byang chub thob po/_/'thob po/_/'thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems
[\[96a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go/_/'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[96a.7\]]kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_
[\[96b.2\]]gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal du med pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
[\[96b.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/_bri ba dang /_bklag pa'i phyir gzhan la byin na de'i bsod nams
[\[96b.4\]]ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas rgyal rigs sA [#]chen po rnams dang /_bram ze'i rigs sA la chen po rnams [#]dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs sA la chen po rnams yod do/_/
[\[96b.5\]]rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs pa chen po dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams
[\[96b.6\]]yod do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yod do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_
[\[96b.7\]]mngon par shes pa drug yod do/_/stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do/_/
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
[\[97a.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams rang byang chub kyi bar la bkod pa lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang [#]la las dge ba bcu'i las
[\[97a.3\]]kyi lam dang /_rang byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[97a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs [#]bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/_chung ngu na bri ba dang /_bklag par bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab
[\[97a.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad do/_/kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_rang byang chub nyid kyi bar las [#]
[\[97a.6\]]bkod pa lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed yod [#]pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong
[\[97a.7\]]ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas nas chung ngu na bri ba dang /_bklag pa'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams rang byang chub kyi bar la bkod pa lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_rang byang chub kyi
[\[97b.2\]]bar la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang
[\[97b.3\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/_chung ngu na bri ba dang /_bklag pa'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams rang byang chub
[\[97b.4\]]kyi bar la bkod pa lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_rang byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod pa bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
[\[97b.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/_chung ngu na bri ba dang /_bklag pa'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams rang byang chub kyi bar la bkod pa lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka phyogs
[\[97b.6\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /_rang byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod pa bas rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha
[\[97b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas nas chung ngu na bri ba dang /_bklag pa'i phyir gzhan la byin na/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]cher bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par gyur to/_/'thob po/_/'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang byang chub thob par
[\[98a.2\]]gyur to/_/'thob po/_/'thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon
[\[98a.3\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /[# ]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i
[\[98a.4\]]bden pa bzhi dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
[\[98a.5\]]rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu [#]rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal du med pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs
[\[98a.6\]]kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di [#]bris shing glegs bam du byas te bri ba dang /_bklag pa'i phyir gzhan la byin na de bas de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel par shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos
[\[98a.7\]]thams cad rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir te/_de dag yod pas rgyal rigs sA la chen po dang /_bram ze'i rigs sA la chen po dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs sA la chen po rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yod do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu [#]rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams yod
[\[98b.2\]]do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams [#]yod do/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bsam gtan bzhi la bkod/_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs
[\[98b.3\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang
[\[98b.4\]]ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du chud par byas te/_chung ngu na bri ba dang /_bklag pa'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/
[\[98b.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_'chang bar 'gyur ba dang /_klog par 'gyur ba
[\[98b.6\]]dang /_kun chub par byed par 'gyur ba dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ba ni [#]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches [#]mang du 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dang /_gling bzhi pa rnams dang /_stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams
[\[98b.7\]]kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams la bkod pas ni ma yin no/_/de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni 'di yin te/_gnyis la spyod pa ma yin pa'i blos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/_'chang bar 'gyur/_klog par 'gyur/_kun chub par byed par 'gyur/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ba'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa ma yin pa'i blos bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[99a.2\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_gnyis la spyod pa ma yin pa'i blos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_'chang bar 'gyur/_klog par 'gyur/_kun chub par byed par 'gyur/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ba'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa ma
[\[99a.3\]]yin pa'i blos nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ba'o//_//bam po sum cu bzhi pa/_gnyis la spyod pa ma yin pa'i blos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_
[\[99a.4\]]yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ba'o/_/gnyis la spyod pa ma yin pa'i blos sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
[\[99a.5\]]tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba ni bkur pa tsam bzhi pa yin no/_/[#]kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gzhan la rnam grangs du mas rgya cher ston par byed/_'chad par byed/_rnam par 'byed/_gsal
[\[99a.6\]]bar byed na/_de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don 'di yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su med par mthong gi gnyis su ni ma yin pa ste/_mtshan mar ma yin/_mtshan ma med par [#]ma yin/_'ong bar ma yin/_'gro bar ma yin/_dbri bar ma yin/_bsnan par ma yin/_
[\[99a.7\]]kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin/_rnam par byang bar ma yin/_skye bar ma yin/_'gag par ma yin/_len par ma yin/_dor bar ma yin/_gnas par ma yin/_mi gnas par ma yin/_yang dag par ma yin/_yang dag pa [#]ma yin par ma yin/_ldan par ma yin/_mi ldan par ma
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]yin/_bag tsam ma yin/_bag tsam ma yin par [#]ma yin/_cha so so bar ma yin/_cha so so ba ma yin par ma yin/_chos nyid ma yin/_chos nyid ma yin par ma yin/_de bzhin nyid ma yin/_de bzhin nyid ma yin par ma yin/_yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin/_yang
[\[99b.2\]]dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par ma yin te/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i don gzhan la rgya cher ston par byed/_'chad pa dang [#]/_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed na 'di nyid bsod nams mang du 'phel gyi/_bdag 'ba'
[\[99b.3\]]zhig 'dzin par 'gyur/_'chang bar 'gyur/_klog par 'gyur/_kun chub par byed par 'gyur/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur bas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bkur ba tsam lnga pa yin no/_/[#]kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig bdag nyid kyang shes
[\[99b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/_'chang bar 'gyur/_klog par 'gyur/_kun chub par byed par 'gyur/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur zhing /_gzhan la yang rgya cher ston par byed/_'chad par byed/_rnam par 'byed par byed/_gsal bar byed na 'di nyid de
[\[99b.5\]]bas bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel lo/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de ltar lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de de ltar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de
[\[99b.6\]]ltar don dang ldan la yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya ste/_kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med/_gzhal du med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bkur ba tsam drug pa yin no/_/[#]kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi
[\[99b.7\]]bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med/_gzhal du med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang [#]/_
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams dang /_bde ba'i yo byad rnams kyis rim gror bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_bsti stang [#]du bya ba dang /_mchod par byas pa bas kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig
[\[100a.2\]]gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/_yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar go bar byas/_yang dag par rab tu gsal bar byas/_rnam par bsgoms [#]par byas/_rnam par grol bar byas yang dag par bstan par byas na/[# ]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid
[\[100a.3\]]kyi bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[100a.4\]]byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bkur ba tsam bdun pa yin no/_/[#]kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las bskal pa grangs med gzhal du
[\[100a.5\]]med par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa bas/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul
[\[100a.6\]]gyis gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu gsal bar byed/_rjod par byed/_mtshon par byed na de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka de la dmigs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa gtong zhing 'di snyam du [#]sbyin pa gtong ngo /_/sbyin pa ni 'di gtong
[\[100a.7\]]ngo /_/'di la sbyin par [#]bya'o snyam na des sbyin pa de ltar btang bas sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur gyi[#]/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma yin no/_/'di ni tshul khrims so/_/bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/_/sems can 'di rnams la bsrung bar bya'o snyam na/_'di ni tshul khrims nyid du 'gyur gyi/_tshul
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma yin no/_/bdag ni bzod pa sgom pa'o/_/bzod pa ni 'di'o/_/pha rol la bzod par bya'o snyam na 'di ni bzod pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma yin no/_/bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/'di ni brtson 'grus so/_/'di rnams kyi don du'o
[\[100b.2\]]snyam na/_'di ni brtson 'grus nyid du 'gyur gyi/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma yin no/_/bdag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go/_/bsam gtan 'di'o/_/'di la ni mnyam par gzhag go snyam na/_'di ni bsam gtan nyid du 'gyur gyi/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
[\[100b.3\]]phyin pa ni ma yin no/_/bdag ni shes rab sgom mo/_/shes rab ni 'di'o/_/'di rnams kyi don du'o snyam na shes rab nyid du 'gyur gyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de ltar dmigs pa la spyod pas ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[100b.4\]]yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_
[\[100b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_ji ltar brtson
[\[100b.6\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[100b.7\]]dpa' chen po sbyin pa gtong [#]pa'i tshe/_yongs su gtong ba mi dmigs/_sbyin pa mi dmigs/_len pa mi dmigs pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do/_/tshul khrims mi dmigs/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa mi dmigs/_sems can mi dmigs pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do/_/bzod pa mi dmigs/_bzod par bya ba mi dmigs/_bzod pa po mi dmigs pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do/_/brtson 'grus mi dmigs/_brtson par bya [#]ba mi dmigs/_lus dang sems mi dmigs pa 'di ni brtson
