[\[159b.5\]]bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis gang la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa [#]dang /_sba bar bya ba de lta bu'i chos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu
[\[159b.6\]]mo ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na de la mi'am mi ma yin pa glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka
[\[159b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams la [#]bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar sems pa de dag ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar sems pa'o/_/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]rmi lam dang /_sgra brnyan dang /_mig yor dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_dri za'i grong khyer rnams la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar nus sam/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de bzhin du byang
[\[160a.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar gang sems pa de ni bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_
[\[160a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar nus sam/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
[\[160a.4\]]rnams la [#]bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar gang sems pa de ni bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la
[\[160a.5\]]bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar nus sam/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams la [#]bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba
[\[160a.6\]]bar gang sems pa de [#]ni bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba'i sbyor ba yin no/_/[#]brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na
[\[160a.7\]]chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_sgra brnyan lta bu dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /_dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /_sprul pa lta bur chos thams cad yongs su shes par 'gyur ba yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]sems dpa' chen pos rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/_de bzhin du sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa de'i tshe/_byang chub
[\[160b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /_chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'i bar du yongs su shes par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam pa bdun du snang ba'i shes pa'i sbyor ba yin te/_'di dag gis ni sbyor ba gsungs so/_/[#]kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub
[\[160b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/_gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed/_gzugs bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/_gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi
[\[160b.4\]]lam gyis [#]rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su mi
[\[160b.5\]]byed do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed/[# ]rnam par shes pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam rlom sems su mi
[\[160b.6\]]byed/_rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su mi
[\[160b.7\]]byed/_de bzhin du so so ba dang /_bsdus pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong
[\[161a.2\]]pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su
[\[161a.3\]]mi byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam
[\[161a.4\]]bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/_rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/_sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/_/zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i mnyam pa nyid yin no/_/[#]
[\[161a.5\]]de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral pa rnams dang /_dga' ldan pa rnams dang /_'phrul dga' ba rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang /_
[\[161a.6\]]tshangs 'khor ba rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po [#]rnams dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi [#]lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig yod pa de [#]thams cad lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor zhing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste
[\[161a.7\]]lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_sangs rgyas stong [#]yi ge 'di
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]nyid dang /_ming 'di nyid dang /_rab 'byor zhes bya ba'i dge slong kho nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba byas shing ston par byed pa dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu bar byed cing chos ston par mdzad pa sems kyis mthong
[\[161b.2\]]bar gyur to/_/de bzhin du shar phyogs dang /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_steng dang /_'og gi phyogs rnams dang /_mtshams rnams thams cad na sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di nyid dang /_ming 'di nyid dang /_rab 'byor zhes bya ba'i dge slong kho nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid
[\[161b.3\]]zhu ba byas shing ston par byed pa dang /_thams cad du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid zhu bar [#]byed cing chos ston par [#]mdzad pa rnams sems kyis mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces [#]bka' stsal to[#]/_/
[\[161b.4\]]rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la de
[\[161b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'byung ba de dag kyang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni
[\[161b.6\]]mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma bcu drug po dbang du gyur par [#]shes par byed pa yin no/_/[#]de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dag dang /_rtags gang dag dang /_mtshan ma gang dag gis byang chub sems
[\[161b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bde zhes bya ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/_bdag ces bya ba'am/_bdag med
[\[162a.2\]]ces bya ba'am/_sdug ces bya ba'am/_mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/_mi rtag ces
[\[162a.3\]]bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bde zhes bya ba'am/_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/_bdag ces bya ba'am/_bdag med ces bya ba'am/_sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa bcings zhes bya ba'am/_grol zhes bya bar
[\[162a.4\]]chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs 'das zhes bya ba'am/_ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba'am/_da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya ba'am/_ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba'am/_
[\[162a.5\]]da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du so so ba dang /_bsdus [#]pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi
[\[162a.6\]]sgo thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
[\[162a.7\]]par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_stobs bcu rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba dang /_da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/[#]de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan
[\[162b.2\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar chos ston par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba
[\[162b.3\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid [#]dang /_byang chub
[\[162b.4\]]kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams [#]dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[162b.5\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_stobs bcu rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_rnam pa thams
[\[162b.6\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab
[\[162b.7\]]'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/de bzhin du phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
[\[163a.2\]]'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu [#]dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
[\[163a.3\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji
[\[163a.4\]]ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_de bzhin du phung po
[\[163a.5\]]dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
[\[163a.6\]]pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_stobs bcu rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa
[\[163a.7\]]rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par
[\[163b.2\]]shes pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/de bzhin du phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs
[\[163b.3\]]kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[163b.4\]]smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs
[\[163b.5\]]pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
[\[163b.6\]]nyid yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na [#]nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du
[\[163b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi [#]nam mkha' ltar skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor nam mkha' gos pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam
[\[164a.2\]]mkha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nam mkha' la gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gos ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun
[\[164a.3\]]'byung la chos shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag
[\[164a.4\]]pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nam mkha' ltar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/[#]gang rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha
[\[164a.5\]]snyad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
[\[164a.6\]]na/_nam mkha' la brag ca gnyis kyi sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tha snyad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa yin no/_/[#]gang rab 'byor nam mkha' brjod du med
[\[164a.7\]]pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni gang yang
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]brjod du med pa'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du brjod du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/[#]gang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[164b.2\]]yongs su dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do/_/rab
[\[164b.3\]]'byor de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa
[\[164b.4\]]med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang /_'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma
[\[164b.5\]]mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes
[\[164b.6\]]pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/_bcom ldan
[\[164b.7\]]'das de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i nad dang /_sna'i nad dang /_lce'i nad dang /_lus kyi nad dang /_yid kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lus rgas pa dang /_'khogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]ni mi bde ba spangs nas [#]dus byed par [#]'gyur ro/_/chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha'i bu stong phrag mang po yang de'i slad bzhin du [#]'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang na
[\[165a.2\]]chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang tshes brgyad dang /_bcu bzhi dang /_bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe bsod nams mang du
[\[165a.3\]]'phel bar 'gyur te/_bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa gzhal du ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs
[\[165a.4\]]kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dam/_bcu bzhi dang /_bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa de'i bsod nams tshad med pa/_grangs med pa/_gzhal du med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_mtshungs pa med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir
[\[165a.5\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che chen po [#]yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che chen po 'di ston par gyur na dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/byol song gi skye gnas las
[\[165a.6\]]yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/dbul po las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs sA la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bram ze'i rigs sA la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag gi rigs sA la chen por skye bar
[\[165a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar byed do/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar sbyin par byed do/_/de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir te/_de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs sA la chen
[\[165b.2\]]po rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs sA la chen po rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs sA la chen po rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral ba rnams dang /_dga' ldan pa rnams dang /_'phrul dga' ba
[\[165b.3\]]rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'od chung gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'od gsal gyi lha
[\[165b.4\]]rnams yod do/_/dge chung gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sprin med kyi lha rnams yod do/_/bsod nams 'phel gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[165b.5\]]mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/rab lta'i lha rnams yod do/_/legs mthong gi lha rnams yod do/_/'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[165b.6\]]cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/[# ]/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/bla na
[\[165b.7\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod na[#]/_bsam gtan bzhi rnams yod do/_/tshad med pa bzhi rnams yod do/_/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[166a.2\]]yod do/_/stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams yod do/_/
[\[166a.3\]]nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams yod do/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams yod do/_/
[\[166a.4\]]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams yod do/_/mngon par shes pa drug rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i [#]sa bcu rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams yod do/_/mi 'jigs
[\[166a.5\]]pa bzhi rnams yod do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/dkon mchog gsum rnams yod do/_/
[\[166a.6\]]sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod do/_/chos dkon mchog yod do/_/dge 'dun dkon mchog yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de dag thams cad rgya cher bstan to/_/de bas na 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni
[\[166a.7\]]lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang yang skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba'am/_yongs su gzung ba'am/_dor ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba'am/_yongs su gzung ba'am/_dor bar bya ba'i chos rnams med do/_/rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa'am/_zag pa med pa'am[#]/_kha na ma tho ba dang
[\[166b.2\]]bcas pa'am/_kha na ma tho ba med pa'am[#]/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'am/_'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa'am/_'dus byas pa'am[#]/_'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang med de/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol
[\[166b.3\]]tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'o zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor 'di la pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni chos gang gis kyang gos pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/_
[\[166b.4\]]rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni gos pa med pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed/_de ltar
[\[166b.5\]]mi dmigs te/_de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/_/[#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_bsti
[\[166b.6\]]stang du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro la/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
[\[166b.7\]]'gro'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rjes su thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa yin te/_'di dag gis ni mthong ba'i lam bstan pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang mthong bar byed pa ma yin/_mi mthong bar byed pa ma yin/_
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]ston par byed pa ma yin/_mi ston par byed pa ma yin/_ster bar byed pa ma yin/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_skye bar byed pa ma yin/_'gag par byed pa ma yin/_'chad [#]par byed pa ma yin/_rtag par byed pa ma yin/_don gcig par [#]byed pa ma yin/_don sna tshogs pa
[\[167a.2\]]ma yin/_'ong bar byed pa ma yin/_'gro bar byed pa ma yin/_kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin/_rnam par byang bar byed pa ma yin/_'grib par byed pa ma yin/_'phel bar byed pa ma yin/_'das par [#]ma yin/_ma 'ongs par [#]ma yin/_da ltar byung bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni thams cad
[\[167a.3\]]shes pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste dang po'o/_/[#]rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las shin tu 'da' bar byed pa'am/_gnas par byed pa ma yin/_gzugs kyi khams las 'da' bar [#]byed pa'am/_gnas par byed pa ma yin/_
[\[167a.4\]]gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar [#]byed pa'am/_gnas par byed pa ma yin/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ster bar byed pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs dang /[# ]smon
[\[167a.5\]]lam dang /_stobs dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ster bar byed pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_nang stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_phyi stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_phyi nang stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin/_
[\[167a.6\]]'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ster bar byed pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ster ba'am/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
[\[167a.7\]]rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams ster bar byed pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_mngon par shes pa rnams ster bar byed pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu rnams ster bar byed pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ster bar byed pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams ster bar byed pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_de bzhin du yang dag par
[\[167b.2\]]spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams ster bar byed pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ster bar byed pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa ma
[\[167b.3\]]yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams ster bar byed pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ster bar byed pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_
[\[167b.4\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster bar byed pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni lam shes pa'i dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste/_gnyis
[\[167b.5\]]pa'o//_//bam po bzhi bcu pa/_rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams [#]ster ba'am/_'phrog [#]par byed pa ma yin/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
[\[167b.6\]]ster bar byed pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin/_'dus byas kyi khams ster bar byed pa'am/_'phrog par byed pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin
[\[167b.7\]]gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung /_chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid de dag ni de bzhin du [#]gnas pa nyid kyi phyir te/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do/_/mngon par
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo /_/ston to/_/'grel to/_/rnam par 'byed do/_/gsal bar mdzad do/_/yang dag par ston to/_/de nas lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod de ga zha [#]phyung
[\[168a.2\]]nas kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang /_ku mu da dang /_puN+Da rI ka dang /_man dA ra ba rnams 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to/_/kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/_'dzam bu'i gling du chos
[\[168a.3\]]kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskor bar mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba [#]yang ma yin/_gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos
[\[168a.4\]]gang yang 'khor ba'am mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/_mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i
[\[168a.5\]]slad du nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus
[\[168a.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis [#]stong ngo /_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid [#]
[\[168a.7\]]stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams lam rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/tshad med pa dang /_bsam
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams rnam par
[\[168b.2\]]thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med
[\[168b.3\]]pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/ting nge 'dzin thams cad ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/
[\[168b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/
[\[168b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
[\[168b.6\]]dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo'o/_/chos thams
[\[168b.7\]]cad kyi rang bzhin yang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya yang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]'tshang rgya ba ma mchis/_chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor la chos gang yang bskor ba'am mi bskor ba yang ma mchis te/_de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba yang ma mchis yongs su mi [#]mthong ba yang ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang bskor bar
[\[169a.2\]]bgyi ba'am/_mi bskor bar bgyi ba'i chos thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu mngon par ma grub pa ste/_stong pa nyid bskor bar bgyi ba'am mi bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa [#]bskor bar bgyi ba'am/_mi
[\[169a.3\]]bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags so/_/smon pa ma mchis pa bskor bar bgyi ba'am/_mi bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags so/_/de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang /_rab tu gsal bar byas pa dang /_brjod pa dang /_btags pa dang /_rab tu bkod pa dang /_rnam par dbye ba dang /_
[\[169a.4\]]rnam par dgrol [#]ba dang /_mtshon pa dang /_yang dag par rab tu gsal bar bgyid [#]pa dang /_yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan/_sus kyang ma bzung /_gang sus kyang ma
[\[169a.5\]]bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so/_/gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma mchis te/_chos bstan pa 'di la ni gang [#]sus kyang sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa ma mchis so zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par
[\[169a.6\]]bstan pa ste gsum pa'o/_/[#]'di dag gis ni thams cad shes pa nyid gsungs so/_/'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rjes su 'brangs nas dag par gtugs [#]pa las thams cad shes pas dbang du byas pa spyod
[\[169a.7\]]pa'i khyad par gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]'byor nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad mi dmigs par mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis
[\[169b.2\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[169b.3\]]phyin pa 'di ni brdzi [#]ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhi ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[169b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ming dang lus med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dmigs su med
[\[169b.5\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol
[\[169b.6\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol
[\[169b.7\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa nyid kyi [#]phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs [#]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zad pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol
[\[170a.2\]]tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad byang zhing zad pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
[\[170a.3\]]stsal pa/_chos thams cad skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byed pa po dmigs su med
[\[170a.4\]]pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shes pa po dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom
[\[170a.5\]]ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'chi 'pho ba dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dul
[\[170a.6\]]ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad 'dul ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
[\[170a.7\]]pa/_rmi lam mthong ba dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgra brnyan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgrar brjod pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzugs dang gzugs brnyan dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di
[\[170b.2\]]lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[170b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtshan ma dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[170b.4\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyon mongs pa can gyi
[\[170b.5\]]sems can [#]dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gos pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nam mkha' dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor
[\[170b.6\]]gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_
[\[170b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]g.yo ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[171a.2\]]'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dod chags dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin
[\[171a.3\]]pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos
[\[171a.4\]]thams cad phyin ci ma log par de bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[171a.5\]]'dod chags dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor
[\[171a.6\]]gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[171a.7\]]'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yongs su rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems [#]
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das
[\[171b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su mi 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtha'
[\[171b.3\]]dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tha mi dad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol
[\[171b.4\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mchog tu 'dzin pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom
[\[171b.5\]]ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha
[\[171b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhal bya ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad kyi tshad [#]dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa'i
[\[171b.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad 'jig [#]pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad lhag par
[\[172a.2\]]chags pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_
[\[172a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi
[\[172a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[172a.5\]]pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nang gi chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyi'i chos dmigs
[\[172a.6\]]su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_
[\[172a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol
[\[172b.2\]]tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das
[\[172b.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dus ma
[\[172b.4\]]byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
[\[172b.5\]]dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa
[\[172b.6\]]nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol
[\[172b.7\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi
[\[173a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rang gi mtshan nyid dben pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi
[\[173a.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dus gsum la dus gsum po dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu
[\[173a.4\]]phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran
[\[173a.5\]]pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lus dang /_tshor ba dang /_sems dang /_chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba'i
[\[173a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan
[\[173a.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dun pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_sems dang /_dpyod pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_dad pa la sogs pa rnams dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stobs lnga dmigs su med pa
[\[173b.2\]]nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis
[\[173b.3\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni thams cad shes pa'i lam la brten pa'i rnam pa yin no/_/[#]
[\[173b.4\]]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lta bas byas pa'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_
[\[173b.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam par rtog pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon pa ma mchis pa'i
[\[173b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
[\[173b.7\]]pa/_rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bden pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun
[\[174a.2\]]'byung [#]dang /_'gog pa dang lam dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ser sna dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/
[\[174a.3\]]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshul khrims 'chal pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di
[\[174a.4\]]lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnod sems dmigs su ma mchis pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi
[\[174a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_le lo dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[174a.6\]]rnam par g.yeng ba dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'chal ba'i shes rab dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/
[\[174a.7\]]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thabs ma yin pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam ma yin pa dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom
[\[174b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stobs chung ba dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi shes pa dmigs su med pa
[\[174b.3\]]nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lam gyi rnam pa [#]shes pa la brten pa'i rnam pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad dmigs su med
[\[174b.4\]]pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zhum pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_
[\[174b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thams cad la ye shes chags pa med pa dang thogs pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
[\[174b.6\]]ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
[\[174b.7\]]ni de bzhin nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad la dbang sgyur [#]ba nyid kyi phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad
[\[175a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad du [#]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten pa'i rnam pa yin te/_'di dag gis ni rnam pa gsungs so/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[175a.3\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du grag [#]par gyur pa de dag kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang dag gi rna lam du grag [#]par gyur pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol
[\[175a.4\]]tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang dag gi rna lam du grag [#]par gyur pa de dag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba yin na[#]/_gang 'dzin par 'gyur/_'chang bar 'gyur/_klog par 'gyur/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur zhing /_bzung /_bcangs/_klags/_kun chub
[\[175a.5\]]par byas nas de kho na nyid du bsgrub [#]par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos te/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur/_'chang bar 'gyur/_klog par 'gyur/_kun chub par byed par 'gyur/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur zhing /_
[\[175a.6\]]bzung /_bcangs/_klags/_kun chub par byas nas kyang de kho na nyid du sgrub par byed par 'gyur te/_de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas dngang bar [#]mi 'gyur/_kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur/_
[\[175a.7\]]kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sngon gyi [#]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su dris[#]/_yongs su zhus/_brten cing [#]bsnyen bkur ba'o/_/gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas dngang bar [#]mi 'gyur/_kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur/_
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba mang po las sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o/_/de dag ni sangs
[\[175b.2\]]rgyas bye ba mang po las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o snyam pa dang /_de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang 'di ltar [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa 'di thos nas
[\[175b.3\]]dngang bar [#]mi 'gyur/_kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur/_kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang [#]'dzin par 'gyur/_'chang bar 'gyur/_klog par 'gyur/_kun chub par byed par 'gyur/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
[\[175b.4\]]phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ba de bzhin du gzung [#]bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa'i slad du ste/_sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnams la ma spyad pas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
[\[175b.5\]]la mos par nus pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar bya bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs par
[\[175b.6\]]gyur to/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir dad pa ma [#]mchis/_rab tu dang ba ma [#]mchis/_dga' ba ma [#]mchis/_mos pa ma [#]mchis pa'i slad du ste/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sangs rgyas
[\[175b.7\]]rnams sam/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams sam/_rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/_nyan thos rnams la ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/_ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/_ji ltar brtson
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/_ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/_ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi/_ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi/_ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la
[\[176a.2\]]spyad par bgyi/_ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyad par bgyi/_ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom [#]par bgyi/_ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag
[\[176a.3\]]rnams dang /_ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams bsgom [#]par bgyi/_ji ltar tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom [#]par bgyi/_ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom par bgyi/_ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad
[\[176a.4\]]rnams bsgom [#]par bgyi/_ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams bsgom par bgyi/_ji ltar stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams bsgom par bgyi/_ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom par bgyi/_ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug
[\[176a.5\]]par bgyi/_ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams la 'jug par bgyi/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom par bgyi/_ji ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom par bgyi/_ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom par bgyi/_ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom
[\[176a.6\]]par bgyi zhes yongs su ma dris so/_/de nas lha rnams kyi [#]dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de ltar zab pa yin na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab
[\[176a.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par ma gyur pa 'di bas ngo mtshar ba ci yod/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]tu phyin pa la mos par ma gyur/_nang stong pa nyid la mos par ma gyur/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mos par ma gyur/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams la mos par ma gyur/_tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
[\[176b.2\]]'jug pa rnams la mos par ma gyur/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams la mos par ma gyur/_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams la mos par ma gyur/_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin
[\[176b.3\]]rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi [#]rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams la [#]mos par ma gyur par [#]spangs par gyur pa de dag las 'dir ngo
[\[176b.4\]]mtshar che ba ci yod/_bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
[\[176b.5\]]la bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin te/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa
[\[176b.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las byung ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rab tu brjod pa'o/_/kau shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid las 'da' bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par
[\[176b.7\]]bya'o/_/de bzhin du lam gyi rnam pa [#]shes pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]byang chub par 'dod pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/_/de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sems can rnams 'god par 'dod pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong
[\[177a.2\]]ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god par 'dod pa dang /_rang byang chub la sems can [#]'god par 'dod pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sems can rnams 'god par 'dod pa dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar 'dod pa'i
[\[177a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[177a.4\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/_ji ltar na sbyor bar 'gyur ba lags/_de bzhin du ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sbyin
[\[177a.5\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/_ji ltar na brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nang stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na
[\[177a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_de bzhin du tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[177a.7\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_de bzhin du rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_de bzhin du
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams la brtson par bgyid
[\[177b.2\]]pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka khyod legs so legs so/_/gang yang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa
[\[177b.3\]]khyod legs so/_/kau shi ka spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs [#]las byung ngo /_/kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_de ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba po rnam pa bzhi yin no/_/[#]kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[177b.4\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs la mi gnas te/_gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/_gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la
[\[177b.5\]]mi gnas pa de'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/_/mig la mi gnas/_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la mi gnas pa de ltar [#]na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/_/gzugs la mi gnas pa de bzhin du sgra dang /_
[\[177b.6\]]dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya [#]dang /_chos la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas/_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_
[\[177b.7\]]sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/_/sa'i khams la mi gnas/_de bzhin du
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/_/ma rig pa la mi gnas/_de bzhin du 'du byed dang /_rnam par
[\[178a.2\]]shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams la mi gnas pa de
[\[178a.3\]]ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas/_de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[178a.4\]]phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/_/nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/_/dran pa
[\[178a.5\]]nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[178a.6\]]phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshad med pa bzhi rnams dang /_bsam gtan bzhi rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar
[\[178a.7\]]pa brgyad rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams dang /_so so
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas pa de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba dang /_gang la rnal 'byor du bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs mi dmigs pa'i
[\[178b.2\]]phyir ro/_/gang la gnas par bya ba dang /_gang la rnal 'byor du bya ba de lta bu'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/gang la gnas par bya ba dang /_gang la rnal 'byor du bya ba de lta bu'i khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing
[\[178b.3\]]'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i
[\[178b.4\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_stobs bcu rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi
[\[178b.5\]]rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa la mi gnas pa'i sbyor ba yin no/_/[#]kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la sbyor bar mi
[\[178b.6\]]byed de/_gang gi tshe gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed pa de'i tshe/_gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed de/_gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed pa de'i tshe rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du
[\[178b.7\]]byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_
