[\[216b.6\]]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na[#]/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni chos nyid gang la chos nyid kyang mi dmigs na/_sems bsdus pa dang sems rnam par g.yengs pa lta smos su med pa'i chos nyid des de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus
[\[216b.7\]]pa dang /_sems rnam par g.yengs pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to zhes bya ba ni sems bsdus pa dang rnam par g.yengs pa shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]bsdus pa dang /_sems rnam par g.yengs pa mi zad pa nyid du yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang /_sems rnam par g.yengs pa mi zad pa'i rnam par yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba
[\[217a.2\]]bzhin du mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang [#]bral ba dang 'gog pa dang rnam par [#]spong ba'i rnam par yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
[\[217a.3\]]kyis sems can de dag gi sems bsdus pa dang /_sems rnam par g.yengs pa zhi ba dang med pa dang dben pa'i rnam par yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to zhes bya ba ni sems mi zad pa'i rnam par shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag
[\[217a.4\]]gi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/zhe sdang dang
[\[217a.5\]]bcas pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la gti mug dang
[\[217a.6\]]bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji [#]lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
[\[217a.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bgyi bar yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa lags/_ji ltar zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bgyi
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]bar yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa lags/_ji ltar na gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bgyi bar yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang
[\[217b.2\]]dang gti mug dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gyur pa'i sems ni dmigs su med cing sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang dmigs su med na/_'dod chags dang bcas pa'am/_
[\[217b.3\]]zhe sdang dang bcas pa'am/_gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes
[\[217b.4\]]bya bar yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba
[\[217b.5\]]bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen/_zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems la zhe sdang dang [#]bral ba'i sems
[\[217b.6\]]zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen/_gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor sems kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni sems kyi 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid
[\[217b.7\]]ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems gnyis 'grogs shing phrad pa med pas so/_/rab 'byor de ltar na [#]sems kyi zhe sdang dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni sems kyi zhe sdang dang bcas pa ma yin/_rab 'byor sems kyi gti mug dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni sems kyi gti mug dang bcas pa ma
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems gnyis 'grogs shing phrad pa med pas so/_/rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
[\[218a.2\]]mkhyen to/_/sems zhe sdang dang bral ba la sems zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/sems gti mug dang bral ba la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang
[\[218a.3\]]bcas pa la sogs pa shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol po rnams dang gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems rgya che ba la sems rgya che ba zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
[\[218a.4\]]mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/_sems can pha rol po rnams dang gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems rgya che ba la sems rgya che ba zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin
[\[218a.5\]]gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol po rnams dang gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems rgya che [#]ba ma yin/_sems rgya chung ba ma yin/_sems 'phel ba ma yin/_sems 'grib pa ma yin/_sems 'ong ba [#]ma yin/_sems 'gro ba ma yin zhes
[\[218a.6\]]bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni [#]'di ltar sems [#]rgya chen po nas 'ong ba'am[#]/_'gro ba ma yin pa'i bar gyi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems
[\[218a.7\]]can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems rgya che ba la sems rgya che ba zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to zhes bya ba ni sems rgya chen po shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten te/_sems
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems rgya [#]chen por gyur pa la sems rgya [#]chen por gyur ces bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol po rnams dang /_
[\[218b.2\]]gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems rgya chen por gyur pa la sems rgya chen por gyur ces bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sems can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems de dag la 'ong ba [#]dang /_'gro ba
[\[218b.3\]]dang /_skye ba dang /_'gag pa dang /_gnas pa dang /_gzhan du gyur pa [#]yang dag par rjes su mi gzigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sems de dag la gang 'ong bar [#]'gyur ba'am/_'gro bar 'gyur ba'am/_skye bar 'gyur ba'am/_'gag par 'gyur ba'am/_gnas par 'gyur ba'am/_
[\[218b.4\]]gzhan du 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems chen por gyur pa la chen por 'gyur [#]ba zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
[\[218b.5\]]rab tu mkhyen to zhes bya ba ni sems chen por gyur pa shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems tshad med pa la sems tshad med ces bya bar yang
[\[218b.6\]]dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems tshad med pa la sems tshad med ces bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_
[\[218b.7\]]rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sems can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems kun nas gnas pa dang /_kun nas mi gnas pa dang /_rnam par gnas pa dang /_rnam par mi gnas par yang dag par rjes su mi gzigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]sems kyi rgyun ni rten med cing tshad med pa ste gang la gnas par 'gyur ba de dag ni rten med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems tshad
[\[219a.2\]]med pa la sems tshad med ces bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to zhes bya ba ni sems tshad med pa shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po
[\[219a.3\]]rnams kyi sems bstan du med pa la sems bstan du med ces bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems bstan
[\[219a.4\]]du med pa la sems bstan du med ces bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir mtshan nyid
[\[219a.5\]]med pa'i sems dang /_rang bzhin dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems bstan du
[\[219a.6\]]med pa la bstan du med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to zhes bya ba ni sems bstan du med pa shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol tu rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po
[\[219a.7\]]rnams kyi sems bltar med pa la bltar med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/[#]rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems bltar med pa la
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]bltar med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan lnga la pha rol po rnams kyi sems de dag snang bar ma gyur to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
[\[219b.2\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems bltar med pa la bltar med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ci [#]lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to zhes bya ba ni sems
[\[219b.3\]]bltar med pa shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems g.yo ba dang /_'du ba dang /_bkram pa dang /_bcum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
[\[219b.4\]]du rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems g.yo ba dang /_'du ba dang /_bkram pa dang /_bcum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_
[\[219b.5\]]rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems g.yo ba dang /_'du ba dang /_bkram pa dang /_bcum pa de dag kyang 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen to/_/sems can rnams kyi sems 'phro
[\[219b.6\]]ba'am/_'du ba'am/_bkram pa'am/_bcum pa gang ji snyed pa skye zhing 'byung ba de dag thams cad gzugs la brten/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la brten nas skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar [#]rab tu mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na de
[\[219b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten te/_sems can de dag gi sems g.yeng [#]ba dang /_'du ba dang /_bkram pa dang /_bcum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grongs nas 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten pa'o/_/
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa grongs nas mi 'byung zhes bya ba dang /_'byung ba yang ma [#]yin/_mi 'byung ba yang ma [#]yin zhes bya ba dang /_'byung ba yang ma yin/_mi 'byung ba yang ma yin zhes bya ba 'di [#]ni gzugs la brten pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grongs nas 'byung
[\[220a.2\]]zhes bya ba ni/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grongs nas mi 'byung zhes bya ba dang /_'byung ba yang [#]yin/_mi 'byung ba yang [#]yin zhes bya ba dang /_'byung ba yang ma yin/_mi 'byung ba yang ma yin zhes
[\[220a.3\]]bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten rtag ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_rtag pa yang yin mi rtag pa yang yin zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[220a.4\]]rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin zhes pa 'di nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten rtag ces bya ba 'di nyid ni bden gyi/_gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba de ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed
[\[220a.5\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_rtag pa yang yin mi rtag pa yang yin zhes bya ba dang /_rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa la
[\[220a.6\]]brten pa'o/_/de bzhin du bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la brten pa'o/_/[#]de bzhin du bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba de ni tshor ba
[\[220a.7\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o/_/bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' med ces bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la brten pa'o/_/de bzhin du bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' med ces bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]gti mug go zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la brten pa'o/_/de bzhin du bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan pa yang yin mtha' med pa yang yin zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba de ni/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o/_/
[\[220b.2\]]bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mtha' med pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba de ni gzugs la brten pa'o/_/de bzhin du bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mtha' med pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden
[\[220b.3\]]gyi/_gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba de ni/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o/_/srog gang yin pa de nyid lus so zhes bya ba dang /_srog kyang gzhan la lus kyang gzhan no zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba
[\[220b.4\]]de ni [#]gzugs la brten pa'o/_/srog gang yin pa de ni lus so zhes bya ba dang /_srog kyang gzhan la lus kyang gzhan no zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/_gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o/_/rab 'byor de
[\[220b.5\]]ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po rnams kyi sems g.yo ba dang /_'du ba dang /_bkram pa dang /_bcum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu [#]mkhyen to zhes bya ba ni sems g.yo ba la sogs pa shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang
[\[220b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te gzugs mkhyen to/_/gzugs ji ltar mkhyen ce [#]na de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_'gyur ba med pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_'bad pa med pa dang /_spros pa med pa dang /_
[\[220b.7\]]dmigs su med pa ji lta ba de ltar mkhyen to/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mkhyen to/_/rnam par shes pa ji ltar mkhyen ce na/_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_'gyur ba med pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /_mtshan
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]ma med pa dang /_'bad pa med pa dang /_spros pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa ji lta ba de ltar mkhyen to/_/rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/_sems can pha rol po rnams dang /_gang zag pha rol po rnams
[\[221a.2\]]kyi sems g.yo ba dang /_'du ba dang /_bkram pa dang /_bcum pa rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_'gyur ba med pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_'bad pa med pa dang /_spros pa med pa dang /_dmigs pa med pa ji lta ba de ltar
[\[221a.3\]]mkhyen to zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor de ltar na g.yo ba dang /_'du ba dang /_bkram pa dang /_bcum pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid do/_/phung po dang /_
[\[221a.4\]]khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi de bzhin nyid do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi
[\[221a.5\]]phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas
[\[221a.6\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin
[\[221a.7\]]nyid do/_/tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mngon par shes pa drug gi de bzhin nyid do/_/mngon par shes pa drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad
[\[221b.2\]]kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni [#]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin
[\[221b.3\]]nyid gang yin pa de ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid do/_/byams
[\[221b.4\]]pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
[\[221b.5\]]bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa rnams dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa
[\[221b.6\]]dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /[# ]rnam par byang ba rnams dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'das pa dang /_
[\[221b.7\]]ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]nyid do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i [#]'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i [#]'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i [#]'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin
[\[222a.2\]]nyid gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do/_/dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid
[\[222a.3\]]gang yin pa de ni rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de
[\[222a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa nyid de/_de ni lhun gyis grub pa'i de bzhin nyid
[\[222a.5\]]do/_/lhun gyis grub pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni mi zad pa'o/_/mi zad pa de ni mi [#]zad pa nyid kyis gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te mngon par shes [#]
[\[222a.6\]]par sangs rgyas so/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed [#]par byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jig rten gyi [#]ston par byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
[\[222a.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid thugs su chud do/_/ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid thugs su chud de/_de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/_/
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid 'di ni zab ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid 'dis ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bstan to/_/bcom
[\[222b.2\]]ldan 'das 'dir slar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_gang zag lta ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams ma gtogs par gzhan su zhig mos par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di
[\[222b.3\]]mngon par sangs rgyas nas gsungs pa'i bar ni shin tu zab po/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni mi zad pa ste/_ci'i phyir mi zad ce na/_chos thams cad mi zad pa'i phyir mi zad pa'i de bzhin nyid de/_rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin
[\[222b.4\]]gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gsungs te/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid thugs su chud pa de mchog tu yang dag par gsungs shing
[\[222b.5\]]btags [#]pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/[#]de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi phye ma yongs su bzung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_
[\[222b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te[#]/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
[\[222b.7\]]mo 'di bshad na/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i mtshan nyid ni stong pa nyid do/_/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]mtshan nyid ni mtshan ma med pa'o/_/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i mtshan nyid ni smon pa med pa'o zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa shes pa yin no/_/[#]lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i mtshan nyid
[\[223a.2\]]ni skye ba med pa'o/_/mtshan nyid 'gag pa med pa'o/_/mtshan nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/mtshan nyid rnam par byang ba med pa'o/_/mtshan nyid dngos po med pa'o/_/mtshan nyid rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid rten pa med pa'o/_/mtshan nyid nam mkha'o/_/mtshan nyid
[\[223a.3\]]rtag pa med pa'o/_/mtshan nyid chad pa med pa'o/_/mtshan nyid mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'o/_/mtshan nyid don gcig pa ma yin pa'o/_/mtshan nyid sna tshogs pa ma yin pa'o/_/mtshan nyid 'gro ba med pa ste mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
[\[223a.4\]]'di'i mtshan nyid de lta bu yin yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi brdar tha snyad du mdzad de/_don dam par ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa la sogs pa shes pa yin no/_/[#]lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dkrugs
[\[223a.5\]]par nus pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa [#]yang mtshan nyid de nyid de lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid 'khrugs par byed pa med pa de [#]mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid shes par mi byed do/_/de ltar mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid med pa dang /_mtshan nyid yod pa
[\[223a.6\]]dang /_mtshan nyid med pa de gnyis ka la yang gang gis shes par bya ba'am/_gang shes par bya ba mi srid do zhes bya ba ni chos nyid rnam par 'khrug [#]pa med pa shes pa yin no/_/[#]lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid de dag ni gzugs kyis 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[223a.7\]]'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pas 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/khams kyis 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/skye mched kyis 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/tshul khrims kyi
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pas 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'dus byas pa ma
[\[223b.2\]]yin no/_/stong pa nyid thams cad kyis 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_
[\[223b.3\]]rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pas 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/mngon par shes pas 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis 'dus
[\[223b.4\]]byas pa ma yin no/_/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyis 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis 'dus byas pa ma yin no/_/
[\[223b.5\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis 'dus byas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du [#]mi byed pa shes pa yin no/_/[#]lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid de dag ni mi'am/_mi ma yin pa'am/_zag pa dang bcas pa'am/_zag pa med pa'am/_'jig rten pa'am/_'jig rten las 'das pa'am/_
[\[223b.6\]]'dus byas pa'am/_'dus ma byas kyi [#]ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag gal te la la zhig nam mkha'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa [#]zhes zer na/_ci de yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin nam/_
[\[223b.7\]]lha'i bu dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par smra bas smra ba ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]nam mkha'i khams 'dus ma bgyis pa'i slad du nam mkha' la mtshan nyid cung zad kyang ma mchis so zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa shes pa'o/_/[#]
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos kyi dbyings 'di gnas pa nyid de/_de ltar mtshan nyid gnas pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa de ltar de
[\[224a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te[#]/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod do/_/lha'i bu dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid zab mo 'di de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_mtshan nyid gang rnams
[\[224a.3\]]mngon [#]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes can no/_/mtshan nyid gang dag la bzhugs [#]nas de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rab
[\[224a.4\]]tu bstan pas/_mtshan nyid de dag yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa de tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul du 'gyur te/_gang la spyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
[\[224a.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang mtshan nyid thams cad rab tu dbye ba mdzad de/_gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang /_tshor ba'i mtshan nyid
[\[224a.6\]]dang /_'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dang /_'du byed rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_de bzhin du phung po'i mtshan nyid dang /_khams kyi mtshan nyid dang /_skye mched kyi mtshan nyid dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid [#]rab tu dbye bar mdzad pa dang /_rnam pa thams
[\[224a.7\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid rab tu dbye bar mdzad pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes bya ba ni rab tu dbye ba shes pa yin no/_/[#]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni [#]gzugs su rung ba ste/_
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]de de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/tshor ba'i mtshan nyid ni nyams su myong ba'o/_/'du shes kyi mtshan nyid ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'o/_/'du byed rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni mngon par 'du byed pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni so so'i
[\[224b.2\]]rang bzhin shes pa ste/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/phung po rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni spungs pa'o/_/khams rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni rigs so/_/skye mched rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni skye ba'i sgo'o/_/rten cing 'brel bar
[\[224b.3\]]'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni tshogs pa ste/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni yongs su gtong ba ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/
[\[224b.4\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni gdung ba med pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'khrug pa med pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni brdzi [#]ba med pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni rjes su 'dzin pa'o/_/shes rab
[\[224b.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni chags pa med pa ste/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni mi 'khrug pa ste/_
[\[224b.6\]]de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi mtshan nyid ni nges par 'byin pa ste/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid
[\[224b.7\]]ni dben pa'o/_/mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid ni zhi ba'o/_/smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'bad rtsol [#]med pa ste/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni grol ba ste/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba'o/_/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni shin tu brtan [#]pa'o/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni yongs su mi chod pa'o/_/byams pa chen
[\[225a.2\]]po'i mtshan nyid ni phan pa bsgrub pa'o/_/snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid ni skyob pa'o/_/dga' ba'i mtshan nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la dang zhing rab tu dga' ba'o/_/btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid ni bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_rnyed pa dang /_ma rnyed pa dang /_grags pa dang /_grags pa
[\[225a.3\]]med pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_smad pa ste/_skyon thams cad snyoms pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni mi 'phrogs [#]pa ste/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
[\[225a.4\]]pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi mtshan nyid ni mngon sum ste/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/lha'i bu dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_des na de bzhin gshegs
[\[225a.5\]]pa chags pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes can zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid med par [#]shes pa yin no/_/[#]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
[\[225a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skyed par byed pa'o/_/'jig rten 'di ston par byed pa'o/_/de'i [#]phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'di la brten cing gnas so zhes bya ba ni nyid kyi chos la brten nas gnas pa shes pa yin no/_/[#]de ltar chos la rim gror mdzad/_
[\[225a.7\]]bla mar mdzad/_bsti stang du mdzad/_mchod par mdzad/_rjed par mdzad/_bkur stir mdzad de/_rab 'byor chos nyid 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/des na [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas rim gror mdzad pa dang /_bla mar mdzad pa dang /_bsti stang du mdzad pa
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]dang /_mchod par mdzad pa dang /_rjed par mdzad pa dang /_bkur stir mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni byas pa mkhyen pa'o/_/rab 'byor gang la la zhig
[\[225b.2\]]yang dag par smra bas byas pa shes shing byas pa tshor ba'o zhes smra na/_de de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa mkhyen cing byas pa tshor ba'o zhes yang dag par [#]smra bas yang dag par smra ba'o/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa byas pa mkhyen cing byas pa tshor bar 'gyur ba yin zhe na/_rab 'byor
[\[225b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa theg pa gang gis byon pa dang lam gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba'i theg pa de [#]nyid dang /_lam de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa rim gror mdzad pa dang /_bla mar mdzad pa dang /_bsti stang du mdzad pa dang /_
[\[225b.4\]]mchod par mdzad pa dang /_rjed par mdzad pa dang /_bkur stir mdzad pa dang /_rjes su 'dzin par mdzad pa dang /_yongs su bsrung [#]bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro/_/[#]rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas byas pa mkhyen pa dang byas pa rig par blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gus par bya ba la sogs pas shes pa yin
[\[225b.5\]]no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas byed pa po med pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad ma byas zhes bya bar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/lus med pa'i phyir ma byas zhes bya bar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rab 'byor 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa
[\[225b.6\]]mkhyen pa dang /_byas pa rig par blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni byed pa med pa can shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byed pa med pa can shes pa chos thams cad la 'jug pa med pa'i brdas 'jug ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs
[\[225b.7\]]des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed par byed pa'o/_/'jig rten 'di ston par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni thams cad du 'gro ba shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang gi [#]tshe chos thams cad shes pa po ma mchis shing mthong ba po ma mchis pa
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]de'i tshe ji ltar na [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed par byed pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa'o/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na chos
[\[226a.2\]]thams cad shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa gsog gsob snying po med pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad ni shes pa po med cing
[\[226a.3\]]mthong ba po med pa ste/_rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi rten cing khongs su chud pa ma yin pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar
[\[226a.4\]]na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed par byed pa'o/_/'jig rten 'di ston par byed pa'o/_/de yang gzugs kyi mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston par byed pa'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mthong ba po med pa'i
[\[226a.5\]]phyir ston par byed pa'o/_/phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston par byed pa'o/_/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston par byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[226a.6\]]pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed par byed pa'o/_/'jig rten 'di ston par byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs kyi mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_ji ltar na
[\[226a.7\]]rnam par shes pa'i mthong ba po ma mchis pa'i slad du ston par bgyid par 'gyur ba lags/_ji ltar na phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi mthong
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston par bgyid pa lags//_//bam po bzhi bcu lnga pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang gi tshe gzugs la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba de'i tshe gzugs kyi mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston par byed pa'o/_/de
[\[226b.2\]]bzhin du gang gi tshe tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba de'i tshe rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston par byed pa'o/_/gang gi tshe phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel
[\[226b.3\]]bar 'byung ba la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba de'i tshe/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston par byed pa'o/_/gang gi tshe pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba de'i tshe pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston
[\[226b.4\]]par byed pa'o/_/gang gi tshe stong pa nyid rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang /_mthar
[\[226b.5\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga rnams dang /_gzugs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams
[\[226b.6\]]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston par byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
[\[226b.7\]]la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba de'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston par byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyed par byed pa'o/_/'jig rten 'di ston par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni ma mthong
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]ba'i don ston pa shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyed par byed pa dang /_'jig rten 'di ston par byed pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten stong ngo zhes brjod [#]
[\[227a.2\]]par mdzad do/_/ji ltar 'jig rten stong ngo zhes brjod par mdzad ce na/_phung po lnga'i 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar brjod par [#]mdzad do/_/skye mched bcu gnyis kyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar brjod par [#]mdzad do/_/khams bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar brjod par mdzad do/_/dge ba
[\[227a.3\]]bcu'i las kyi lam gyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar brjod par [#]mdzad do/_/bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar brjod par [#]mdzad do/_/ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis
[\[227a.4\]]kyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar brjod par [#]mdzad do/_/'jig tshogs la lta [#]ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyi lta bas byas pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi 'jig rten stong ngo [#]zhes bya bar brjod par mdzad do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar brjod par [#]mdzad do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[227a.5\]]drug gi [#]'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar brjod par [#]mdzad do/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar brjod par [#]mdzad do/_/stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams
[\[227a.6\]]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar brjod par [#]mdzad do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar brjod par [#]mdzad do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin
[\[227a.7\]]gshegs pa skyed par byed pa'o/_/'jig rten 'di ston par byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar shes par mdzad do/_/ji ltar na 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar shes par mdzad ce na/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]'byung ba dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_'jig tshogs la lta ba sngon du 'gro ba can lta bas byas pa drug cu rtsa gnyis dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
[\[227b.2\]]bdun dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar shes par mdzad do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes
[\[227b.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyed par byed pa'o/_/'jig rten ston par byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar ston par mdzad do/_/ji ltar 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar ston par mdzad ce na/_
[\[227b.4\]]phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_'jig tshogs la lta ba sngon du 'gro ba can lta bas byas pa drug cu
[\[227b.5\]]rtsa gnyis dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
[\[227b.6\]]nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar ston par mdzad do/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyed par byed pa'o/_/'jig rten 'di ston par mdzad pa'o zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam par brjod par mdzad pa dang /_shes par mdzad pa dang /_ston par
[\[227b.7\]]mdzad pa shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston te/_ji ltar 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston zhe [#]na/_phung po lnga [#]dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]'byung ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to/_/de bzhin du rnam par dben zhes bya ba dang /_shin tu stong zhes bya ba dang /_rang bzhin stong zhes bya bar ston to/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[228a.2\]]phyin pa zab mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/phung po lnga'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/de bzhin du khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/_/
[\[228a.3\]]rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed par byed pa'o/_/'jig rten 'di [#]ston par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang zhi ba nyid shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten
[\[228a.4\]]stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston te/_phung po lnga'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/de bzhin du khams dang /_skye mched kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston
[\[228a.5\]]to/_/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/_/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed par byed pa'o/_/'jig rten 'di ston par byed pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yang de bzhin
[\[228a.6\]]gshegs pa la 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes dang /_'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar 'jig rten ston to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes dang /_'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu med do zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten 'du shes
[\[228a.7\]]'gog pa shes pa yin te shes pa'i mtshan nyid yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bya bas dang /_mnyam pa ma mchis pa'i bya bas dang /_
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]gzhal du ma mchis pa'i bya bas dang /_grangs ma mchis pa'i bya bas dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bya bas nye bar gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bya ba
[\[228b.2\]]chen pos nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/_'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi skyabs dang gnas dang yongs su mi gtong ba'i don gyis so/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bsam gyis mi khyab
[\[228b.3\]]pa'i bya bas nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
[\[228b.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bya bas nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di [#]mi mnyam pa'i bya bas nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor sems can gyi ris na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang rim gror
[\[228b.5\]]bya ba mnyam pa'i sems can ni 'ga' yang med do/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mnyam pa med pa'i bya bas nye bar gnas so[#]/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de
[\[228b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la gzhal du med pa'i bya bas nye bar gnas pa gang [#]yin zhe na/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni sus kyang tshad bya bar mi nus pas gzhal du
[\[228b.7\]]med pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gzhal du med pa'i bya bas nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la grangs med pa'i
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]bya bas nye bar gnas she [#]na/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus pas grangs med pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa
[\[229a.2\]]rnams la grangs med pa'i bya bas nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bya bas nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_mnyam pa yang med na lhag pa lta ci smos te/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[229a.3\]]phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bya bas nye bar gnas so/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci yang sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mnyam pa
[\[229a.4\]]ma mchis pa dang /_gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /_grangs ma mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_
[\[229a.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rab 'byor gzugs
[\[229a.6\]]kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_
[\[229a.7\]]grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]nyid kyi bar yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
[\[229b.2\]]pa'o/_/rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni sems sam sems las byung ba rnams kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa shes
[\[229b.3\]]su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa shes su med pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du khams dang /_skye mched dang /_
[\[229b.4\]]rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa shes su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med
[\[229b.5\]]pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa shes su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /_grangs ma mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
[\[229b.6\]]shes su ma mchis pa lags/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /_grangs ma mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa shes su ma mchis pa lags/_de bzhin du khams dang /_
[\[229b.7\]]skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /_grangs ma mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa shes su ma mchis pa lags/_de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /_grangs ma mchis pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa shes su ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs la yang bsam pa dang /_mnyam pa dang /_tshad dang /_grangs dang /_mi mnyam
[\[230a.2\]]pa dang mnyam pa shes su med do/_/de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang bsam pa dang /_mnyam pa dang /_tshad dang /_grangs dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa shes su med do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad
[\[230a.3\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi bsam pa dang /_mnyam pa dang /_tshad dang /_grangs dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa shes su ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mnyam pa med pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_
[\[230a.4\]]grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mnyam pa med pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam
[\[230a.5\]]pa dang mnyam pa ste/_rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[230a.6\]]de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_
[\[230a.7\]]mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmigs su yod dam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa med pa de la tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_
[\[230b.2\]]mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs su yod dam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gang [#]bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs
[\[230b.3\]]su yod dam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rab
[\[230b.4\]]'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa dang bral ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/mnyam pa dang bral ba'i phyir mi mnyam pa'o/_/tshad dang bral ba'i phyir gzhal du med pa'o/_/bgrang ba dang bral ba'i phyir grangs med pa'o/_/mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dang bral ba'i phyir mi mnyam
[\[230b.5\]]pa dang mnyam pa ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni bsam pa las yongs su 'das pas na bsam gyis mi khyab
[\[230b.6\]]pa'o/_/mnyam pa las yongs su 'das pas na mi mnyam pa'o/_/tshad ma las yongs su 'das pas na gzhal du med pa'o/_/bgrang ba las yongs su 'das pas na grangs med pa'o/_/mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa las yongs su 'das pas [#]na mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/rab 'byor bsam
[\[230b.7\]]gyis mi khyab ces bya ba ni bsam du med pa'i tshig bla dgas so/_/rab 'byor mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni dpag tu mi rung ba'i tshig bla dgas so/_/rab 'byor gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa'i tshig bla dgas so/_/rab 'byor grangs med pa [#]zhes bya ba ni bgrang du med pa'i tshig bla dgas so/_/rab
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]'byor mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas te/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/
[\[231a.2\]]rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba ni nam mkha' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba dang /_gzhal du med ces bya ba dang /_grangs med ces bya ba dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor de
[\[231a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_de dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bsam pa'am/_mnyam par ram/_
[\[231a.4\]]tshad mar ram/_grangs su'am mnyam pa dang /_mi mnyam par bya bar mi nus te/_de ltar na sangs rgyas gzhal du med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gzhal du med do/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_grangs med pa dang mi
[\[231a.5\]]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/dge slong ma brgya phrag nyi shu nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/dge bsnyen stong phrag drug cu dang /_dge bsnyen ma stong phrag nyi shu
[\[231a.6\]]ni chos rnams la rdul dang bral zhing dri ma dang bral ba'i chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/_/[#]byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag nyi shus ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/_de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to zhes bya ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa
[\[231a.7\]]la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi skad cig ma bzhi yin no/_/[#]de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab ste/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa'o/_/
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba tshad ma mchis pa dang /_bya ba mi mnyam pa dang /_bya ba gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /_bya ba grangs med pa dang /_bya ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
[\[231b.2\]]ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba tshad med pa dang /_bya ba mi mnyam pa dang /_bya ba gzhal du med pa dang /_bya ba
[\[231b.3\]]grangs med pa dang /_bya ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/_/
[\[231b.4\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rnams dang /_dbang po lnga rnams dang /_stobs lnga rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnams dang /_'phags pa'i
[\[231b.5\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni bsam gtan bzhi rnams dang /_tshad med pa bzhi rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa
[\[231b.6\]]brgyad rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa drug rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
[\[231b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/_/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yul 'khor thob pa'i rgyal po'i bya bar gyur pa gang dang [#]gang yin pa de dag thams cad blon po dang
[\[232a.2\]]ldan na rgyal po'i bya ba'am/_yul 'khor gyi bya ba la rgyal po snying las chung zhing khur bor bar gyur pa yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos gang ci yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad shes rab kyi
[\[232a.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang yang dag par ldan na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [#]de dag gi bya ba byed do/_/rab 'byor de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa'o[#]/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas dang /_bya ba mi mnyam pas dang /_bya ba
[\[232a.4\]]gzhal du med pas dang /_bya ba grangs med pas dang /_bya ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni gzugs kyi [#]yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa'o/_/tshor
[\[232a.5\]]ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi yongs su ma bzung [#]ba dang /_mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i
[\[232a.6\]]'bras bu'i yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa'o/_/de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_
[\[232a.7\]]mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas so/_/[#]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na [#]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzugs kyi yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa'i yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi yongs su ma bzung ba dang /_mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[232b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod kyis gzugs gang yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am/_mngon par zhen par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod kyis [#]tshor ba dang /_
[\[232b.3\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung [#]bar bya ba'am/_mngon par zhen par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_rab 'byor khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gang yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am/_mngon par zhen par bya ba de
[\[232b.4\]]lta bu yang dag par rjes su gzung [#]ngam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/rab 'byor ngas kyang gang [#]yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am/_mngon par zhen par bya ba'i gzugs de lta bu yang
[\[232b.5\]]dag par rjes su ma mthong /_rab 'byor ngas kyang gang [#]yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am/_mngon par zhen par bya ba'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_rab 'byor ngas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par
[\[232b.6\]]rjes su ma mthong /_yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su ma bzung /_yongs su ma bzung bas mngon par ma zhen to/_/rab 'byor ngas kyang sangs rgyas nyid dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yang dag par rjes su ma
[\[232b.7\]]mthong /_yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su ma bzung /_yongs su ma bzung bas mngon par ma zhen to/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs yongs su gzung bar mi bya/_mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]chen pos tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung bar mi bya/_mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag
[\[233a.2\]]rnams yongs su gzung bar mi bya/_mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_
[\[233a.3\]]bsam gtan rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs
[\[233a.4\]]pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams yongs su gzung bar mi bya/_mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar yongs su gzung bar mi bya/_mngon par zhen
[\[233a.5\]]par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas nyid dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yongs su gzung bar mi bya/_mngon par zhen par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad sdud [#]pa'i khyad par kun 'byung gi skad cig ma
[\[233a.6\]]dang po yin no/_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab cing blta dka' la rtogs par dka' ba brtag [#]tu ma mchis pa rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa ste/_bcom
[\[233a.7\]]ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zhi ba/[# ]phra ba/_mdzangs pa/_mkhas pa/_rnam par shes pas rig par bgyi ba ste/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni nges par sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa lags/_
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba 'di dag ni nges par dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o zhes bya ba ni skyes bu mkhas pas rig par bya ba nyid kyi khyad par kun 'byung gi skad cig ma gnyis pa
[\[233b.2\]]yin no/_/[#]bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba [#]dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba [#]dang /_
[\[233b.3\]]dgra bcom par 'gyur[#]/_rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur [#]te/_de dag thams cad kyi shes pa dang spangs pa gang ji snyed pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig tu bzod cing mos pa dang /_bsam pa dang /_gzhal ba dang /_nye bar bstan [#]pa dang /_bgrang ba'i tshul de ltar shes
[\[233b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bzod cing mos na 'di nyid de dag las mchog dang gtso bor khums [#]lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid
[\[233b.5\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa dang /_spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rang sangs rgyas
[\[233b.6\]]kyi bar gyi shes pa dang /_spangs pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa'o zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i khyad par te kun 'byung gi skad cig ma gsum pa yin no/_/[#]lha'i bu dag rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha
[\[233b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing thos nas bri ba dang /_bris nas lung 'bogs pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shin tu myur bar mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod par bya'i/_nyan thos kyi theg pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams dang /_
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i mdo sde gzhan la spyod pa dag ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las phul du byung ba'i chos gang la dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_brgyad
[\[234a.2\]]pas bslab par bya ba dang /_gang la rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang /_gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis bslab par
[\[234a.3\]]bya ba dang /_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis [#]bslabs te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par [#]sangs rgyas par gyur pa de dag rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mngon par shes pa myur ba'i khyad par kun
[\[234a.4\]]'byung gi skad cig ma bzhi pa yin no/_/[#]de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol
[\[234a.5\]]tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/mi mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gzhal du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/grangs ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_bcom
[\[234a.6\]]ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo gang la bslabs shing dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas
[\[234a.7\]]rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/_gang la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]'di 'grib pa'am/_'phel bar yang 'tshal bar [#]mi gda'o zhes bya ba ni 'grib pa dang 'phel ba med pa'i khyad par te/_'gog pa'i skad cig ma dang po yin no/_/[#]de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_
[\[234b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ste/_de nas shin tu yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag ni 'dod pa'i khams su 'khod do/_/gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag ni
[\[234b.3\]]gzugs kyi khams su 'khod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur ba de dag gang nas shi 'phos
[\[234b.4\]]nas 'dir skyes par gyur pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur/_zhum par mi 'gyur/_yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur/_rmongs par mi 'gyur/_
[\[234b.5\]]the tshom za bar mi 'gyur/_nem nur du mi 'gyur la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par mngon par brtson par 'gyur zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang yid la byed pa de dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar yid la bya ba de dag 'gro'am 'ong ngam 'greng ngam 'dug gam nyal
[\[234b.6\]]yang rung ste/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'jig par mi byed cing chos smra ba'i gang zag de la yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par [#]rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_ba drus ma be'u gzhon nu mi 'dor ba ltar rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[234b.7\]]pa zab mo 'di'i don du ji srid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni khong du chud par bya ba dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_yongs su bsams pa dang /_yid kyis rtogs par bya ba dang /_lta bas legs par rab tu rtogs par ma byas pa de srid du chos smra ba de stong [#]par mi 'gyur na/_rab 'byor theg pa
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]la gsar du zhugs pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mi'i nang nyid nas shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sngon yang shes rab kyi pha
[\[235a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/_me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba mang pos rim gror byas/_bla mar byas/_bsti stang du byas/_
[\[235a.3\]]mchod par byas/_rjed par byas/_bkur stir byas te/_de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni drag tu 'grub [#]pa'i khyad par te/_'gog pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa
[\[235a.4\]]yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis shing 'phos te 'dir skye ba gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing
[\[235a.5\]]mos par gyur nas kyang 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang /_bris nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_lung 'bogs par 'gyur ba dang /_kha ton bgyid par 'gyur zhing /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ba'i yon tan 'di dag nyid dang ldan pa'i rnam grangs de lta bu dag mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[235a.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur byas shing /_de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par
[\[235a.7\]]'gyur/_mos par gyur nas kyang 'dri bar 'gyur/_bris nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/_lung 'bogs par 'gyur/_kha ton byed par 'gyur/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ba'i yon tan 'di dag nyid dang ldan pa'i rnam grangs de lta bu dag yod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos so/_/thos nas kyang bzung ngo /_/bcangs so/_/bklags [#]so/_/kha ton byas so/_/tshul bzhin du yid la byas so/_/de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang yid la byed pa
[\[235b.2\]]de dag gis 'dir skye ba'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi lha rnams nas shi 'phos nas 'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ba gang yin pa de yang yon tan 'di nyid dang ldan par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar
[\[235b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dris pa ste/_de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'dir skye'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan [#]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
