[\[291b.3\]]gtogs [#]pa'i gnas skabs las phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags bcu bdun pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bdud sdig to can dge sbyong gi cha byad du 'ongs te/_'di skad du gang khyod kyis sngon [#]'di ltar bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha
[\[291b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/
[\[291b.5\]]'di ltar bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes bya
[\[291b.6\]]ba de dag thams cad shogs shig_/gang khyod kyis 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_de [#]ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos dang bcas pa rnams kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar
[\[291b.7\]]gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba de dag so sor shogs shig [(]thong [,]thongs [)]shig_/gang khyod kyis thos pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin te/_de ni rang bzor byas pa'o/_/gang ngas bshad pa
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'o zhes zer la/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khrug cing dogs par byed dam/_the tshom za na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
[\[292a.2\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis lung ma bstan par rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni ma nges pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i khams su gnas pa ma yin/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mi 'khrug cing
[\[292a.3\]]dogs par mi byed the tshom mi za la [#]chos nyid la brten cing mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang ma skyes pa la brten te/_gzhan la yid ches pas mi 'gro la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson
[\[292a.4\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing 'di lta ste dper na dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pas gzhan la yid ches pas mi 'gro zhing chos nyid
[\[292a.5\]]mngon sum du 'gyur bas bdud sdig to can gyis mi 'phrogs pa de bzhin du/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis mi brdzi [#]zhing nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/[# ]
[\[292a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi chos las phyir mi ldog na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges pa yin te/_phyir mi ldog pa'i khams su gnas shing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin no/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
[\[292a.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yid ches pas kyang mi 'gro na/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/_sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/_bdud sdig can nam/_mu stegs can nam/_kun du rgyu ba gzhan dag la yid ches pas [#]'gro bar 'gyur ba [#]lta ci smos te/_
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]de ni gnas med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gang la yid ches pas 'gro ba'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am[#]/_'du shes sam/_'du byed rnams sam/_rnam par shes
[\[292b.2\]]pa'am/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dam/_tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dam/_'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dam/_'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dam/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dam/_de bzhin du phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_rten cing
[\[292b.3\]]'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_rnam par thar pa thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i
[\[292b.4\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
[\[292b.5\]]'dres pa rnams dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo [#]/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag
[\[292b.6\]]dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag la gnas pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags bco brgyad pa yin no//_//bam po lnga bcu pa/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[292b.7\]]chen po'i drung du bdud sdig to can dge sbyong gi cha byad du 'ongs nas 'di skad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa 'di ni 'khor bar spyod pa yin gyi/_'di nyid du khyod kyis [#]sdug bsngal mthar phyin par gyis shig ces zer zhing bdud sdig to can de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la lam
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]gyi gzugs brnyan ston te/_gang 'khor bar spyod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i rnam pas lam gyi [#]gzugs brnyan yang na rus par 'du shes pa dang [#]/_yang na bsam gtan dang po dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar ston cing /_tshe dang ldan pa lam gang dang
[\[293a.2\]]nan tan gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_lam gang gis dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba'i lam 'di dag dang nan tan 'dis 'di nyid du khyod kyis sdug bsngal gyi [#]mthar [(]phyung [,]phyungs [)]shig
[\[293a.3\]]dang /_phyin chad khyod kyis [#]'khor ba na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal de dag myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kye ma bdag gi lus 'di nyid du mngon par ma grub na khyod lus gzhan yang ji ltar yongs su gzung bar sems zhes zer yang /_rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
[\[293a.4\]]sems mi 'khrugs [#]mi g.yo zhing gong du yang 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar bdag la lam gyi [#]gzugs brnyan ston pa ni [#]dge slong 'di [#]ni bdag la phan 'dogs par ston pa ste/_lam gyi gzugs brnyan des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byed par yang mi 'gyur/_lan cig
[\[293a.5\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed par yang mi 'gyur/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed par yang mi 'gyur/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed par yang mi 'gyur/_rang byang chub mngon du byed par yang mi 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon du byed par yang
[\[293a.6\]]mi 'gyur ro snyam ste/_de las kyang gong du gang bdag la yan lag 'di dag ston pa'i dge slong 'di ni bdag la phan 'dogs pa yin gyi[#]/_bdag gis de dag shes par bya ste theg pa gsum po kun la bslab par bya'o zhes dga' ba bskyed la/_bdud sdig to can des kyang byang chub sems dpa'
[\[293a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po de dga' bar gyur par shes pas [#]de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad kyis rim gror
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]byas pa dang /_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi drung du gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu
[\[293b.2\]]phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
[\[293b.3\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur byas te/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[293b.4\]]la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gnas par bgyi ba dang /_de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan
[\[293b.5\]]lag rnams dang /_lam rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_rnam par thar pa thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
[\[293b.6\]]'jug pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po'i bar la spyod pa'i tshe gnas par bgyi'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa [#]'di nyid kyi don du kun dris
[\[293b.7\]]shing yongs su zhus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la lta bar 'dod dam/_ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bshad pa la de ltar gnas/_de ltar spyod [#]de ltar brtson par byas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu dag gis bla na med pa
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/_de ltar gdams pa dang /_de ltar yongs su bstan pa dang /_de ltar gnas pa dang /_de ltar slob pa rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob na/_khyod kyis bla na med pa yang
[\[294a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur re skan zhes brjod de/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de phyir bzlog tu zin kyang de'i sems gzhan du mi 'gyur la mi dngang /_kun du mi skrag_/kun du skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur zhing gang du yang dge slong 'di ni de ltar bdag
[\[294a.3\]]la chags pa gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par mi 'gyur ba'i chags pa ston pa ni bdag la phan 'dogs pa'o zhes
[\[294a.4\]]dga' ba skyed pas bdud sdig to can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i sems la zhum pa med par rig nas sa'i phyogs de nyid du dge slong mang po mngon par sprul nas 'di skad du dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa 'di dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
[\[294a.5\]]'jug 'jug [#]pa sha stag ste/_de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur na/_khyod ltas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur re skan zhes zer yang [#]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di snyam ste/_'di ni bdud
[\[294a.6\]]sdig to can te [#]lam gyi gzugs brnyan ston pa'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung la de las kyang gong du 'di
[\[294a.7\]]snyam ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa [#]dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_
[\[294b.2\]]byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams la spyod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang /_tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_'phags
[\[294b.3\]]pa'i bden pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgoms [#]pas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
[\[294b.4\]]chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bzod par gtogs pa'i gnas skabs te phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags bcu dgu pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
[\[294b.5\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du gal te de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad du bstan pa de ltar bslab pa la spyod pa de dang ma bral zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa de dag gis spyod pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su mi nyams/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
[\[294b.6\]]yongs su mi nyams/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su mi nyams/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su mi nyams/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su mi nyams/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su mi nyams/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi
[\[294b.7\]]stong pa nyid dang /[# ]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las yongs su mi nyams/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams las yongs su mi nyams/_tshad med pa dang /_
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las yongs su mi nyams/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su mi nyams/_rnam par thar pa thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[295a.2\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams las yongs su mi nyams/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams so [#]snyam la/_rab 'byor
[\[295a.3\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sus bdud kyi las su [#]rig pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su mi nyams so snyam na/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
[\[295a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mchog tu gtogs pa'i gnas skabs te phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags nyi shu pa yin no/_/[#]de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom
[\[295a.5\]]ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci las slar mi [#]ldog pa'i slad du phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni gzugs kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/tshor ba'i 'du shes dang /_'du shes kyi
[\[295a.6\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams kyi 'du shes dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/khams kyi 'du shes dang /_skye mched kyi 'du shes dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'du shes dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag gi 'du shes dang /_'dod chags kyi
[\[295a.7\]]'du shes dang /_zhe sdang gi 'du shes dang /_gti mug gi 'du shes dang /_lta ba'i 'du shes dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du shes dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du shes dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du shes dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du shes dang /_
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du shes dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'du shes dang /_dran pa nye bar [#]gzhag pa'i 'du shes dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
[\[295b.2\]]dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam gyi 'du shes dang /_tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/rnam par thar pa thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_
[\[295b.3\]]gzungs kyi sgo'i 'du shes dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i 'du shes dang /_mngon par shes pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa'i 'du shes dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa'i 'du shes dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
[\[295b.4\]]'dres pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi [#]'du shes las phyir ldog go/_/
[\[295b.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug ste/_des rdul tsam yang dmigs pa med do/_/dmigs pa med pas mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/
[\[295b.6\]]mngon par 'du mi byed pas skye ba med de/_de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' [#]mi skye ba la bzod pa zhes bya ste/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o zhes bya
[\[295b.7\]]ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyi sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bdud sdig to can nye bar 'ongs te/_mos pa bzlog cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni rnam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dngos po med pa'i
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o/_/chos 'di dag kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o/_/de ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la gang mngon
[\[296a.2\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de dag gang yang mi dmigs te/_chos 'di dag thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas
[\[296a.3\]]'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni khyod [#]nyon mongs pa [#]don med par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni bdud kyis bstan pa'o/_/'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa ma yin no/_/des na rigs
[\[296a.4\]]kyi bu yid la byed pa de dag [(]thong [,]thongs [)]la khyod [#]yun ring por gnod pa med pa dang don med par ma spyod cig_/sdug bsngal dang log par ltung ngo [#]zhes zer na/_de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo des tshig de dag thos nas 'di snyam du brtag par bya ste/_de ltar bdag
[\[296a.5\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las zlog pa de ni bdud kyi las te/_chos thams cad ni [#]nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong mod kyi/_de dag sems can rnams kyis ma shes ma mthong khong du ma chud kyi de'i phyir bdag gis
[\[296a.6\]]nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i go cha bgos te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas la sems can thams cad [#]la chos bstan to/_/sems can tshad med pa rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la
[\[296a.7\]]rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/rang byang chub la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po des sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_chos de dag thos nas sems brtan par bya'o/_/sems mi g.yo bar bya'o/_/sems mi 'phrogs [#]par bya'o/_/sems brtan pa dang /_sems mi g.yo ba dang /_sems mi 'phrogs [#]pa dang ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa la
[\[296b.2\]]spyod na byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par [#]'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa yin no/_/[#]de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyir mi ldog pa zhes
[\[296b.3\]]bgyi ba'am/_'on tam [#]slar ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyir mi ldog pa'o [#]zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor phyir [#]mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_
[\[296b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du slar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las phyir phyogs pa de ni/_rab
[\[296b.5\]]'byor slar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las phyir phyogs pa de ni/_rab
[\[296b.6\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir ldog pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o[#]/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_
[\[296b.7\]]mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig to can gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog [#]par mi nus so zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dod na bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la snyoms par 'jug go/_/'gog pa'i bar la snyoms par 'jug go/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dod na dran pa nye
[\[297a.2\]]bar gzhag pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams la snyoms par 'jug go/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la snyoms
[\[297a.3\]]par 'jug go/_/mngon par shes pa lnga'i bar mngon par bsgrub po/_/de bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /[# ]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po rnams la 'dris par byed/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams goms par byed/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
[\[297a.4\]]pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go/_/[#]bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/'gog pa'i
[\[297a.5\]]bar gyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/rang byang chub yongs su 'dzin par mi byed do/_/de 'dod
[\[297a.6\]]na ched du bsams shing lus yongs su 'dzin te/_lus gang gis sems can rnams kyi don bya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin to/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog
[\[297a.7\]]par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub yid la byed pa dang ldan te/_byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral zhing gzugs lhur len pa ma yin/_mtshan nyid lhur len pa ma
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]yin/_lus lhur len pa ma yin/_sbyin pa lhur len pa ma yin/_tshul khrims lhur len pa ma yin/_bzod pa lhur len pa ma yin/_brtson 'grus lhur len pa ma yin/_bsam gtan lhur len pa ma yin/_shes rab lhur len pa ma yin/_tshad med pa lhur len pa ma yin/_gzugs
[\[297b.2\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa lhur len pa ma yin no/_/mngon par shes pa lhur len pa ma yin/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams lhur len pa ma yin/_rnam par thar pa thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams lhur len pa ma yin/_stong pa
[\[297b.3\]]nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams lhur len pa ma yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams lhur len pa ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu lhur len pa ma yin/_mi 'jigs pa lhur len pa ma yin/_so so yang dag par rig pa lhur len pa ma yin/_
[\[297b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams lhur len pa ma yin/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lhur len pa ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba lhur len pa ma yin/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba lhur len pa ma yin/_sangs rgyas blta [#]ba lhur len pa ma yin/_
[\[297b.5\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lhur len pa ma yin no/_/[#]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yid la byed pa
[\[297b.6\]]de dang ldan pas spyod lam bzhir 'gro ba'am 'ong na yang nor ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro/[# ]nor ba'i sems kyis mi 'ong /_nor ba'i sems kyis mi sdod/_nor ba'i sems kyis mi 'chag mi 'dug mi nyal te/_dran bzhin du 'gro'o/_/'ong ngo /_/'chag go/_/sdod do/_/'dug go/_/
[\[297b.7\]]nyal lo/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni khyim gyi nang na gnas kyang thabs mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la gnas nas sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_zas 'dod pa la zas/_skom 'dod pa la skom nas mi'i
[\[298a.2\]]yo byad gzhan dang gzhan dag gi bar du yang [#]yongs su gtong ste/_de bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod do/_/gzhan gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi
[\[298a.3\]]yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed do/_/de bzhin du bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de[#]/_gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul
[\[298a.4\]]lo/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod do/_/gzhan gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed do zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
[\[298a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni khyim gyi nang na gnas nas 'dzam bu'i gling rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang zhing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gsum gyi
[\[298a.6\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed yod pa rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang zhing sbyin pa yongs su [#]gtong yang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la yongs su mi spyod do/_/de rtag tu rgyun mi chad par tshangs par spyod cing gnod pa gang gis gzhan mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnod pa [#]de lta bu gang yang
[\[298a.7\]]mi bskyed do/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyi bzhin du byang chub
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang bdag gis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes
[\[298b.2\]]su 'brang bar bya'o zhes gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/ji tsam du lag na rdo rje [#]rigs lnga rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba de tsam du de la mi'am mi ma yin pa dag gis gnod par mi nus te/_de la 'jig rten na lha'am/_
[\[298b.3\]]bdud dam/_lha ma yin nam/_tshangs pa'am/_gang sus kyang chos dang mthun par rdzi ba med do zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/[#]de'i sems byang chub yid la byed pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du
[\[298b.4\]]rnam par g.yeng bar mi byed de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i [#]dbang po 'di dag [#]ste/_dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po dag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ni skyes bu dam
[\[298b.5\]]par 'gyur te/_skyes bu dma' ba ma yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bu dam pa lags shing skyes bu dma' ba ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub
[\[298b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa de'i tshe/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bu dam par 'gyur ba yin gyi/_skyes bu dma' ba ma yin no/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub
[\[298b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub yid la bya ba dang ldan zhing bud med dbang du bya ba'i sngags dang rig pa dang sman dang rtsi la sogs pa thams cad rnam pa
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]thams cad kyi [#]thams cad du mi sbyor sbyor du mi 'jug ste/_bud med dang skyes pa ze slong ba'i bag gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang mi byed do/_/bud med dam skyes pa gang yang rung ste/_de dag la bu btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhe'am/_bu mo btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhe'am/_rigs kyi lha lta bu
[\[299a.2\]]yod par 'gyur ro [#]zhe'am/_tshe ring bar 'gyur ro zhes yongs su ston pa'i cho 'phrul mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid kyis [#]stong pa'i chos rnams la mtshan ma yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i phyir te/_des mtshan ma
[\[299a.3\]]yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas gnas pa yin te/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o [#]zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa yin no/_/[#]
[\[299a.4\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog par rig par bya ba'i [#]rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag bstan gyi shin tu legs par nyon la yid la [(]zung [,]zungs [)]shig dang ngas bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes
[\[299a.5\]]gsol nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das la [#]phyir nyan to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral ba yin te/_
[\[299a.6\]]phung po'i sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor bar mi [#]gnas/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched kyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor bar mi gnas/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag gi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor bar mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid la gnas nas chos gang yang
[\[299a.7\]]dman pa'am mchog tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/[#]rkun po'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor bar mi gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rang bzhin gyis
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]stong pa'i chos rnams la chos gang yang 'phrogs pa'am mi 'phrogs pa yang rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa yin no/_/[#]dmag gi gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor bar mi gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pas chos
[\[299b.2\]]gang yang nyung ngu'am mang por yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/[#]g.yul gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor bar mi gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos nyid la gnas pas chos gang yang rjes su chags
[\[299b.3\]]pa'am khong khro bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/grong gi gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba la mi gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pas chos gang yang tshogs sam tshogs ma yin par yang [#]dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir
[\[299b.4\]]ro/_/grong khyer gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba la mi gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de nam mkha' stong pa nyid la gnas pas chos gang yang bsdu ba'am mi bsdu bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/grong rdal gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba la mi gnas te/_
[\[299b.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pas chos gang yang 'phel ba'am 'grib pa [#]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de bdag gi gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba la brtson par [#]mi gnas te/_de bzhin du sems can dang /_srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso [#]
[\[299b.6\]]ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shed bdag dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba la mi gnas te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzhan du na shes rab
[\[299b.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor bar gnas pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral ba yin no zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa yin no/_/[#]de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing ser sna'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba la mi
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]gnas so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims ngan pa'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba la [#]mi gnas so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'khrug pa'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor bar mi gnas so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha
[\[300a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing le lo'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor bar mi gnas so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing g.yeng ba'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor bar mi gnas so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab 'chal ba'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su
[\[300a.3\]]sbyor bar mi gnas so/_/de chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod cing chos 'dod pa yin gyi chos mi 'dod pa ma yin pa dang /_de chos kyi dbyings la spyod cing chos tha mi dad pa'i legs pa brjod pa dang de bshes gnyen 'dod pa yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub
[\[300a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tha dad [#]du gshes gnyen 'dod pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba dang /_des par 'jug pa dang rab tu 'god de/_
[\[300a.5\]]de 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams blta ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams gang na bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong zhing gzhes pa [#]der skye bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas yid la bya bas nyin mtshan du rnam par gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de
[\[300a.6\]]ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni phal cher 'dod pa'i khams dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa skyed [#]cing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas nas gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon du gyur par
[\[300a.7\]]bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de bsam gtan dang po [#]bskyed 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar du bskyed cing gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]du gyur par bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba der skye bar 'gyur te/_rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag [#]ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor
[\[300b.2\]]gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba
[\[300b.3\]]dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams la gnas pa dang /_tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa la gnas pa dang /_
[\[300b.4\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams la gnas pa dang /_rnam par thar pa thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig
[\[300b.5\]]pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas pa ni 'di snyam du bdag ni phyir ldog pa'am/_phyir [#]ldog pa ma yin no snyam yang mi byed de the tshom mi skye zhing rang gi sa la dogs pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des phyir ldog pa dang /_phyir ldog pa ma yin pa'i chos rdul tsam yang yang
[\[300b.6\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu [#]rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i sa la gnas pa ni [#]rang gi sa la nem nur med cing the tshom mi za'o/_/de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa'i sa la gnas pa dang /_rang
[\[300b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa ni rang gi sa la nem nur med cing the tshom mi za'o/_/[#]rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rang gi sa la nem nur med cing the tshom mi za'o/_/de phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas te sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ngo /_/sems can rnams kyang yongs
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]su smin par byed do/_/bdud kyi las skyes shing byung ba rnams kyang shes te bdud kyi las kyi dbang du yang mi 'gro/_/bdud kyi las de dag thams cad kyang shes te shes nas kyang rnam par 'joms shing srab mor byed do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_mtshams med pa'i las byed pa'i skyes bu ni 'chi ka'i
[\[301a.2\]]bar du yang mtshams med pa'i sems dang mi bral [#]zhing mtshams med pa'i sems de'i rjes su 'brang ngo /_/mtshams med pa'i sems de thabs mkhas pas [#]thams cad kyis kyang rnam par gzhil bar mi nus so/_/kun nas ldang ba de 'chi ka'i bar du yang rjes su 'brang ngo /_/rab 'byor de bzhin du phyir mi
[\[301a.3\]]ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sems de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas te/_sems de mi sgul bas de ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis [#]phyir ldog par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i
[\[301a.4\]]sems des [#]lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten las 'das te/_yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs pa'i phyir ro/_/de rang gi sa la gnas shing mngon par shes pa rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/sems can rnams kyang
[\[301a.5\]]yongs su smin par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang 'gro/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po bskyed [#]cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la kun 'dri zhing yongs su zhu ba byed bsnyen bkur byed do/_/rab 'byor byang chub
[\[301a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de ltar gnas pas bdud kyi las skyes shing byung ba rnams khong du chud de bdud kyi las skyes shing byung ba de dag gi dbang du yang [#]mi 'gro'o/_/bdud kyi las de dag kyang thabs mkhas pas yang dag pa'i mtha' la sbyor bar byed cing de rang gi sa la nem nur med cing the tshom mi
[\[301a.7\]]za'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de yang dag pa'i mtha' la nem nur med pas yang dag pa'i mtha' la [#]gcig gam gnyis su rnam par rtog par mi byed de/_tshe 'phos nas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la chos gang yang skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis [#]stong pa la chos gang yang skye ba'am/_
[\[301b.2\]]'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de tshe 'phos nas kyang 'di snyam du bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi 'gyur ro snyam du mi byed de/_
[\[301b.3\]]bdag ni gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems
[\[301b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rang gi sa la gnas pa dang /_rang gi sa la gzhan gyi kha na ma tho ba las 'das [#]pa dang /_rang gi sa la rdzi ba med pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gnas pa ni mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes dang
[\[301b.5\]]ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du nye bar 'ongs nas 'di skad du khyod kyis 'di nyid du dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyis shig_/khyod ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
[\[301b.6\]]chub tu lung ma bstan te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis gang gis [#]khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa khyod kyis ma thob po/_/rnam pa gang dag dang /_rtags gang dag dang /_
[\[301b.7\]]mtshan ma gang dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag kyang khyod la med do zhes zer yang rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgra de
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]thos nas mi 'dzum [#]mi dngang kun du mi skrag kun du skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur/_de'i sems gzhan du mi 'gyur na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bla na med pa yang
[\[302a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag bdag la yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lam
[\[302a.3\]]la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gal te bdud sdig to can nam bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i skyes bu zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du nye bar 'ongs nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod nyan thos nyid du lung bstan gyi [#]khyod bla na med pa
[\[302a.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu [#]ni ma yin na[#]/_bla na med pa'i byang chub kyis ci zhig bya zhes zer yang /_rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[302a.5\]]dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang dag par bskul bar mi [#]mdzad de/_kye ma 'di ni bdud sdig to can gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i skyes bu zhig sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du nye bar 'ongs so snyam du sems pa dang /_gal te rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung
[\[302a.6\]]du bdud sdig to can gyis sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du nye bar 'ongs nas de la 'di skad du gang la khyod spyod pa'i mdo sde 'di dag ni bdud kyis bshad pa ste/_'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nyan thos rnams kyis bshad pa ma yin no zhes zer na/_rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[302a.7\]]chen pos kye ma gang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang 'bral bar byed pa 'di ni bdud sdig to can nam bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i [#]skyes bu'o zhes bya bar rig par byed na/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[302b.2\]]chen po rnams kyi rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag ni de la yod pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang
[\[302b.3\]]phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir bdag yongs su gtong bar byed/_srog yongs su gtong bar yang byed do/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni
[\[302b.4\]]dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir 'di ltar brtson par byed do/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par [#]byed do/_/de la chos gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag yongs su gtong bar yang
[\[302b.5\]]byed/_srog yongs su gtong bar yang byed ce na/_rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis [#]chos thams cad stong ngo [#]zhes bstan to/_/de la skyes bu blun pa la las 'di ni chos ma yin/_'di ni 'dul ba ma yin/_'di ni ston pas bstan pa ma yin no
[\[302b.6\]]zhes phyir rgol zhing ngan du brjod do/_/rab 'byor chos de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag yongs su gtong bar yang byed srog yongs su gtong bar yang byed do/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/_gang de bzhin
[\[302b.7\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos 'byung bar 'gyur ba der bdag kyang 'grang [#]ngo bdag kyang der lung bstan te/_chos gang gi phyir bdag yongs su gtong bar yang byed pa dang /_srog yongs su gtong bar yang byed pa de yang bdag gis chos so zhes yongs su brtag
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos don gyi dbang 'di mthong nas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung [#]ba'i phyir bdag yongs su gtong bar byed/_srog yongs su gtong bar yang byed do/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_
[\[303a.2\]]mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos ston pa la nem nur med/_
[\[303a.3\]]the tshom mi za zhing gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag [(]gsung [,]gsungs [)]pa de thams cad yongs su 'dzin to/_/'di ltar bzung [#]nas kyang chud za bar mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gzungs rab tu thob pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
[\[303a.4\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs gang thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo rnams 'chab [#]mi 'tshal ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo rnams 'dzin pa'i byang
[\[303a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzungs rab tu [#]thob pas chud mi za'o/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'ba' zhig gis [#]'chab mi 'tshal du bas kyi nyan thos kyis bshad pa ma
[\[303a.6\]]lags sam/_lhas bshad pa ma lags sam/_klus bshad pa ma lags sam/_gnod sbyin gyis bshad pa ma lags sam/_dri zas bshad pa ma lags sam/_lha ma yin gyis bshad pa ma lags sam/_nam mkha' lding gis bshad pa ma lags sam/_mi'am cis bshad pa ma
[\[303a.7\]]lags sam/_lto 'phye chen pos bshad pa ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni skad dang brda dang sgra gang yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad la nem nur med cing the tshom mi za'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar de [#]'dzin pa'i
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]gzungs zhes bya ba rab tu thob pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la
[\[303b.2\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di [#]ni yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yon tan gzhal du ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'o/_/bcom ldan
[\[303b.3\]]'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di [#]ni yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yon
[\[303b.4\]]tan chen po dang ldan pa'o/_/rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yon tan gzhal du ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'o/_/rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni
[\[303b.5\]]'di ltar des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_thun mong ma yin pa'i ye shes mtha' yas mu med pa rab tu 'thob pa'i phyir ro/_/ye shes de la gnas shing phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa mngon par bsgrub pa gang gis lha dang mi dang
[\[303b.6\]]lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dris kyang lan zad par mi 'gyur ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa mngon par bsgrub po zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa yin no/_/[#]'di dag gis ni mthong ba'i lam la gnas pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags bstan pa yin no/_/[#]de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab
[\[303b.7\]]'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rnam pa gang dag [#]dang /_rtags gang dag [#]dang /_mtshan ma gang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]dbye bar bgyi ba phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan ma rnams bskal [#]pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du ston par spyod lags na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug
[\[304a.2\]]la spyod pa'i tshe/_gang la gnas shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid
[\[304a.3\]]dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_tshad med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[304a.4\]]smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /_rnam par thar pa thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa
[\[304a.5\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gnas zab mo zab mo rnams legs par bstan du gsol zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam zab pa yin no/_/[#]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[304a.6\]]rab 'byor de ltar khyod phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas zab mo zab mo rnams zhu bar sems pa legs so/_/legs so/_/rab 'byor zab mo zab mo zhes bya ba 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig [#]bla dgas so/_/'di ni
[\[304a.7\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gag [#]pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig bla dgas so/_/rab 'byor gnas [#]zab
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]mo zab mo gang dag yin pa 'di dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig bla dgas so/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci zab mo zhes bgyi ba 'di mya ngan las 'das pa 'ba' zhig gi tshig bla dgas lags [#]sam/_'on te chos thams cad kyi yang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[304b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor zab mo zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas kyang yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs zab po/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zab po/_/rab 'byor mig zab po/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du rna
[\[304b.3\]]ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid zab po/_/rab 'byor gzugs zab po/_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos zab po/_/rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa zab po/_/rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab po/_/
[\[304b.4\]]rab 'byor de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab po/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zab po/_/rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab po/_/rab 'byor sa'i khams zab po/_/chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam
[\[304b.5\]]mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams zab po/_/rab 'byor rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab po/_/rab 'byor ma rig pa zab po/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_srid pa dang /_len pa dang /_
[\[304b.6\]]srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi zab po/_/rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun zab po/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar
[\[304b.7\]]pa thams cad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_tshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo zab po/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zab po/_/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab po/_/rab 'byor ji ltar na gzugs zab/_ji ltar na tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zab/_ji ltar
[\[305a.2\]]na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du zab/_ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab ce na/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs zab po/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa zab
[\[305a.3\]]po/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab po/_/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
[\[305a.4\]]rnams zab po/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin
[\[305a.5\]]dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo zab po/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /[# ]snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de [#]bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos
[\[305a.6\]]ma 'dres pa rnams zab po/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab po zhes bya ba ni bsgom [#]pa'i lam gyi zab pa nyid yin no/_/[#]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni [#]ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang /_
[\[305a.7\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni [#]ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid ni ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gzugs kyi de
[\[305b.2\]]bzhin nyid de la gzugs kyang med/_gzugs las gud na yang de bzhin nyid med de/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de la rnam par shes pa yang med/_rnam par shes pa las gud na yang de bzhin nyid med [#]
[\[305b.3\]]de/_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/_/rab 'byor skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid de [#]la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang med/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las gud na yang de bzhin nyid med de/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/_/
[\[305b.4\]]rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang med/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las gud na yang de bzhin nyid med de/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de
[\[305b.5\]]lta bu'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang med/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las gud na yang de bzhin nyid med de/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
[\[305b.6\]]pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/_/rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid de la stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa yang med/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa las gud
[\[305b.7\]]na yang de bzhin nyid med de/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/_/mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang med/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang de bzhin nyid med de/[# ]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/_/rab 'byor rnam pa
[\[306a.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang de bzhin nyid med de/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni de lta bu'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar
[\[306a.3\]]thabs phra bas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs las kyang bzlog/_/mya ngan las 'das pa yang bstan/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa las kyang bzlog_/mya ngan las 'das pa yang bstan/_
[\[306a.4\]]skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las kyang bzlog_/mya ngan las 'das pa yang bstan/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las kyang bzlog_/mya ngan las 'das pa yang bstan/_sangs rgyas kyi
[\[306a.5\]]chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar las kyang bzlog_/mya ngan las 'das pa yang bstan/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las kyang bzlog_/mya ngan las 'das pa yang bstan/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_thun mong ba dang /_thun mong ma yin pa dang /_
[\[306a.6\]]zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa ma mchis pa'i 'dzin pa thams cad las kyang bzlog_/mya ngan las 'das pa yang bstan pa de ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi sgro 'dogs pa dang /_skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' las grol ba nyid yin no/_/de skad ces gsol
[\[306a.7\]]pa dang [#]/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin bdag gis 'di ltar gnas par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]phyin pa las ji ltar nye bar bstan pa bzhin bdag gis 'di ltar bslab par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji skad bshad pa bzhin bdag gis 'di ltar bsgrub par bya'o snyam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i gnas zab mo zab mo 'di dag la sems par 'gyur 'jal bar 'gyur nges par
[\[306b.2\]]rtogs par 'gyur na zhes bya ba ni bsgom [#]pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid do/_/de bzhin du sgrub par byed/_de bzhin du nges par rtog par byed/_de bzhin du nye bar rtog par byed/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_de bzhin du sbyor ba dang /_de bzhin du 'bad par byed pa na sems bskyed pa gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med
[\[306b.3\]]gzhal du med tshad med pa yongs su 'dzin cing bskal pa tshad med par 'khor ba spong bar byed na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma 'dres par spyod cing byang chub yid la bya ba dang ldan par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas gnas pa lta ci smos zhes bya ba ni nges par 'byed
[\[306b.4\]]pa'i cha dang mthun pa la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'i lam yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu 'dod chags la spyod cing rnam par rtog pa zhig gis bud med gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta [#]na sdug pa 'ga' zhig btus la/_bud med de gzhan gyi [#]yongs su bzung [#]ba zhig ste khyim nas phyir
[\[306b.5\]]'byung bar ma nus na/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu de la rnam par rtog pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu de la ni bud med dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyid 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/'ongs nas kyang de dang lhan cig nyal bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[306b.6\]]rtse bar bgyi'o/_/dga' bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su spyad par bgyi'o snyam mo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_nyin mtshan 'das pas skyes bu de'i rtog pa ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ro[#]/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni mang ngo /_/
[\[306b.7\]]skyes bu de'i rnam par rtog pa de nyin mtshan 'das pas shin tu mang bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor skyes bu de'i rnam par rtog pa nyin mtshan 'das pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba de snyed kyi bskal par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor ba spong zhing rgyab [#]kyis bltas pas
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]mthar byed par 'gyur ro/_/gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji skad du bstan pa 'di la slob pa dang /_nye bar rtog pa dang /_sems pa dang /_nyes pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par
[\[307a.2\]]'gyur ba'i nyes pa de dag ci nas kyang spang bar 'gyur ba de ltar brtson par byed na/_rab 'byor de ltar brtson pas rjes su brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gnas pa des nyin gcig la dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yongs su gzung [#]ba
[\[307a.3\]]des gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams yongs su gang bar gyur kyang des ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i lhag ma las brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya stong gi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o zhes
[\[307a.4\]]bya ba ni phan yon rnam pa gsum yin no/_/[#]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bas bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog dang /_
[\[307a.5\]]dkon mchog gsum la sbyin pa byin na[#]/_rab 'byor ji snyam du sems/_ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ste/_gzhal du ma mchis grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis/_mtshungs
[\[307a.6\]]pa ma mchis so zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs chen po'i chen po yin no/_/[#]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la brtson par byed na/_de'i bsod nams ches
[\[307a.7\]]mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_theg pa gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa de ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i phyogs chung ngu'i [#]chung ngu yin no//_//
